scn aaQuantrillDiaryScript
Begin OnAdd Player If GetStage aaBounties01 < 17 showmessage aaQuantrillDiaryMessage setstage aaBounties01 17 Endif End

scn aaEileenNPCScript
Begin OnDeath additem aaEileenFinger 1 if V03MotorRunnerRef.GetDead == 1 aaMotorheadRef.enable Endif End

scn aaBounties01QuestScript
Short MessageDisplayed Short RandallGreeted Short BountyKilled short CullenGreeted short InterviewFailed short CoyoteGreeted short MotorheadGreeted short TonyAlerted short RowdyGreeted short PulloGreeted short AlexGreeted short BlueBearStarted short FredGreeted short Bullshit short MagoGreeted short MagoEscaped short JackGreeted short ChuckGreeted short DallasGreeted short LukeGreeted short SugarGreeted short FinalMessage short JudgeGreeted short SentryGreeted short CoyoteBluffed short JudgeHired short GuardsKilled
short PerksUpdated
Begin Gamemode
if PerksUpdated == 0 AddFormToFormList PerkCowboyWeapons aaFergusonRifle AddFormToFormList PerkCowboyWeapons aaEileenKnife AddFormToFormList PerkCowboyWeapons aaCoyoteShotgun AddFormToFormList PerkCowboyWeapons aaJackRevolver AddFormToFormList PerkCowboyWeapons aaKurtShotgun AddFormToFormList PerkCowboyWeapons aaJudgeHatchet AddFormToFormList PerkCowboyWeapons aaSweetRevenge AddFormToFormList NVHoldoutWeapons aaEileenKnife set PerksUpdated to 1 endif
If aaRandallRef1.GetDead == 1 setstage aaBounties01 200 Endif
if aaBounties01.MessageDisplayed == 0 If SomeguyMaster.NVBStatus == 0 If Getstage aaBounties01 < 1 showmessage aaBounties01IntroMessage setstage aaBounties01 1 set aaBounties01.MessageDisplayed to 1 endif Endif endif
If Getstage aaBounties01 == 35 If player.getdistance aaCullenAmbushMarkerRef <= 500 If aaBounties01.CullenGreeted == 0 aaCullenRef.enable set aaBounties01.CullenGreeted to 1 Endif Endif Endif
If player.getdistance aaMagoGasMarkerRef <= 500 If aaBounties01.MagoGreeted == 0 showmessage aaMagoBunkerMessage aaMagoInnerHatchRef.lock set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 1 Endif Endif
If player.getdistance aaPlayerinJailMarker <= 500 If aaBounties01.MagoGreeted == 5 showmessage aaMagoWakeUpMessage set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 6 Endif Endif
If player.getdistance aaJackRef <= 2500 If GetStage aaBounties01 == 95 If aaBounties01.JackGreeted == 0 showmessage aaJackReadyMessage set aaBounties01.JackGreeted to 1 Endif Endif Endif
If player.getdistance aaChuckShackMarker <= 2000 If GetStage aaBounties01 == 115 If aaBounties01.ChuckGreeted == 0 showmessage aaChuckShackMessage set aaBounties01.ChuckGreeted to 1 aaChuckRef.enable aaChuckLegionary1Ref.enable aaChuckLegionary2Ref.enable Endif Endif Endif
If GetStage aaBounties01 == 125 If aaBounties01.LukeGreeted == 0 If VFSCalebMcCaffery1REF.IsKiller player == 1 set aaBounties01.LukeGreeted to 1 aaLukeMcCafferyRef.enable aaDanMcCafferyRef.enable aaJesseMcCafferyRef.enable else set LukeGreeted to 10 endif endif endif
If GetStage aaBounties01 == 135 If aaDallasRef.GetDead == 1 SetStage aaBounties01 140 endif Endif
If GetStage aaBounties01 == 135 If aaBounties01.DallasGreeted == 10 SetStage aaBounties01 140 endif Endif
End

scn aaSweetRevengeSCRIPT
; This script updates the someguyseries.esm for Sweet Revenge's use in "future events"
begin OnAdd Player
set SomeguyMaster.SweetRevenge to 1
end
;
begin OnDrop Player
set SomeguyMaster.SweetRevenge to 0
end
;
begin OnEquip Player
set SomeguyMaster.SweetRevenge to 2
end
;
begin OnUnequip Player
set SomeguyMaster.SweetRevenge to 1
end

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Alex
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：艾利克斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Alex Race: Caucasian Allegiance/Faction: White Glove Society? (Speculation) Location: Freeside (sporadic appearances)
Notes: The poor inhabitants of Freeside are apparently enduring attacks by a collection of well-dressed hoodlums led by a thug named Alex. They've somehow gathered the money for a contract, so we're obligated to fulfill our end of the bargain. I've got scant information about Alex, since junkies are hardly proficient at gathering intelligence. Based on their accounts, I'm guessing he's a rogue member of the White Glove Society, and he's getting his rocks off by tormenting Freeside's less fortunate denizens. Get out there and give Alex a taste of his own medicine.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：艾利克斯 种族：高加索人 派别：白手套（推测） 位置：自由之城（偶尔露面）
备注： 自由之城里的人们最近正在被一伙打扮时髦的流氓们骚扰，那伙人的头叫艾利克斯。他们好像在为一位份合同卖力，我们必须终止他们的这项肮脏的交易。我得到的消息有限，之所以说有限是因为那些来源根本就是些没脑子的笨蛋。根据这些情报，艾利克斯同时也是白手套的会员，他把他的快乐建立在自由之城的那些孤立无援的人们的痛苦之上。是时候让他尝尝罪有应得的滋味了。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Unknown
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：未知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Unknown Race: Unknown Allegiance/Faction: Ghoul? (Speculation) Location: Vicinity of Novac
Notes: Recently several children were abducted from Novac, and there's only one half-assed witness. Ricky is a drug-addled layabout, but he's the only lead we have. Of course, I have my own theories. There are an unusual number of ghouls near Novac, especially near the REPCONN facility, and I'm willing to bet that zombies apprehended the children in order to devour their brains. There's only one way to deal with those zombies: shoot em' in the head!
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：未知 种族：未知 派别：食尸鬼？（推测） 位置：诺瓦克附近
备注： 最近在诺瓦克附近有几个孩子被绑架了，而且只有一个目击证人--里基。虽然他是个嗑药鬼，但他是我们唯一的线索。当然，我有考虑过别的可能性。在诺瓦克附近有超乎寻常数量的食尸鬼，尤其是在REPCONN附近。我打赌那些僵尸是想吃小孩的脑子了。对付那些家伙只有一个办法：爆掉他们的头！
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Unknown
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：未知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Unknown Race: Unknown Allegiance/Faction: Unknown Location: Vicinity of Mojave Outpost
Notes: Disappearances in the Wasteland are hardly noteworthy, but the NCR has detected a steady pattern of abductions along the highway north of the Mojave Outpost. Over the years, countless drifters have passed through, claiming to have knowledge of an elusive "Oasis" in the Mojave, only to vanish in the wastes. Naturally these were chalked up as casualties of the wasteland, but the number of disappearances has grown in recent months. What spurred the NCR's investigation was the inexplicable disappearance of a lawman from Needles, and then the equally perplexing disappearance of his brother (who was searching for his lost sibling). This all points to something nefarious, but leads are scarce. Your best bet is to comb the highway for any clues that could lead you in the right direction. Good luck.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：未知 种族：未知 派别：未知 位置：莫哈维前哨站附近
备注： 在废土上一般的失踪案件不足以注意，但NCR察觉在通往莫哈维北方前哨站的路上发生了多起绑架事件。这么多年，无数的流浪者从此经过，声称要去寻找莫哈维的绿洲，但结果却都以失踪告终。这些人会被记为自然的废土受难者，但这几个月来，失踪的人数却明显增加。不久前，一位政府执法者先是失踪，然后寻找他的亲弟弟也接着失踪的事件更是督促NCR正式展开调查。这些事件共同指向了某些邪恶的东西，但线索却几乎没有。你最好沿着高速路一遍一遍展开梳理，相信你能找到相关线索并走向正确的方向。祝你好运。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Competition
ESP.TRADUIT: 竞争

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Coyote,
After your inquiry into the paucity of contracts of late, I investigated the matter in full.
It's come to my attention that a new firm, "Randall & Associates" has been utilizing &pcname;, an up and coming contractor in the Mojave.
Your unquestioning loyalty and determination to see the success of our organization is appreciated, so consider this information a token of our continuing partnership. I trust you will deal with the matter shortly.
Sincerely, Judge Richter
ESP.TRADUIT:
野狼：
自从你询问最近合同大量减少的原因，我便开始展开全面调查。
有一家新公司引起了我的注意，“兰道尔同伙会”。他们还雇佣了一个叫&pcname;的家伙，不过这家伙的阅历我调查之后，发现也不过就是只嫩鸡。
你不容置疑的忠诚和果断见证了我们事业的成功。现在，这个情况摆在我们面前，又到了是你拿出点决定的时候了。我相信你能很快处理好这个问题。
真诚的， 审判官李希特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your purchase
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您的惠顾

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your Honor,
I'd like to personally thank you for continuing your biannual purchase of our top-line warrior slaves. You will find them pliant, imposing, and utterly proficient in all manner of combat. I personally managed your order, and each item is hand-picked from the most fearsome tribes across the continent.
As usual, your property will be outfitted with the SS-250 model, which features a fail-deadly protocol in the event of your untimely demise. It is 100% effective in deterring property "malfunction".
As an expression of my gratitude for your loyalty, I've included a special bonus, Vahsi. He's a former Vandal (a fierce tribe), captured in his prime and augmented with multiple combat implants. He will do your bidding without hesitation, fear, or remorse. He is the most lethal human property I've discovered to date, and he's all yours. Please, do not attempt to offer reimbursement for the gift - consider it a token of my gratitude.
Sincerely, E. Jones President, Servitude Solutions, Inc.
P.S. Thank you for referring Marko to our business. He was responsible for capturing Vahsi, so it seemed fair that you should reap the rewards of our new acquisition.
ESP.TRADUIT:
尊敬的阁下：
我以个人的名义向您的购买再次表示感谢。你会发现，我们这里的这些质量顶尖的奴隶性格温顺，身体强壮，而且还能参与各种战斗。我亲自执行了您的订单，手把手把他们从远方最恐怖的部落运送到这里来。
跟以前一样，您的资产被配以SS-250型号，具有双重终结优势的模块，可以100%有效制止您的财产“损失”。
为向您的忠诚表示致意，我送上一个小礼物，瓦希。他是一个汪达尔人（一个异常勇猛的部落），在他青壮年的时候被我们抓获。我们给他植入了多种战斗用植入器。他能做任何你要求他做的事情，而且毫不犹豫。这是我到现在位置见过的最优秀的东西，但他是你的了。请不要为这件礼物给我做任何补偿，因为只是我衷心送给您的礼物。
真诚的， E.琼斯 董事长，奴役百事通 公司.
P.S.感谢您曾推荐马尔科来参与我们的业务。他为抓捕瓦希起到了重要的作用。所以这看起来似乎还是很公平的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Movements
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备开工

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Judge,
Littlehorn said I could rely on you as a contact in the Mojave. The Regulators back east managed to chase me out of the Capital Wasteland, no thanks to that damned Marshal. Luckily the pickings in the plains have been easy. There's no law in these parts, and the raiders just need leadership. My warband is gathering strength, and we're making a killing selling captives to the legion. So far Caesar has labeled us a foederatus, which grants us license to pillage outside the legion's territory (which is substantial - the legion's control is nominal past the Rio Grande.) When I've gathered enough men and material, I'll move my tribe further west. Until then, I'll be in touch.
- Marko
P.S. Say hello to Randall for me. I'm sure he's written me off as a dead end by now.
ESP.TRADUIT:
审判官：
“小号角”的人说在莫哈维我可以以合同的形式依附你。东岸的执法者把我赶出了废土首都，都是那个可恶的马歇尔干的好事。
好在，我来了以后很快就适应了这个地方。这个地方根本就没有任何法律，这里的土匪需要领导，正好适合我。我们的实力现在正在增强，我们把很多抓到的人卖到军团去当奴隶。至少到现在，凯撒还在和我们做交易，这允许我们可以自由进出他们的领地（这一点很重要）。
当我积累了足够的人手和物资后，我会带我的人向西移动。在那之前，我还会和你保持联系。
- 马尔科
P.S. 请代我向兰道尔表示问候。我确定他一定会怀念我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arrangements
ESP.TRADUIT: 安排

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tony,
I'll keep supplying the materials as long as you supply the caps. And another thing - don't fuck me, Tony. Don't you ever try to fuck me.
- Alexander
ESP.TRADUIT:
托尼：
只要你继续为我提供瓶盖，我还是会像以前那样提供给你产品的。但是，你他妈别想上我了，托尼。只要你不想上我就行。
- 亚历山大

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是棒极了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Violet,
You were right about applying the fire - I used your method and it worked like a charm.
The NCR punk cried like a bitch from the start, and I had to cut out the tongue to keep the noise down. Later I burned his feet until he couldn't feel it, then cut off the cooked parts. I started over on the unburned flesh and it was like having a fresh captive again - the bastard squirmed so much I had to use another strap to keep him under control.
After I got to his knees, I cut off his eyelids and let him sit under the sun for a couple days, giving him water to drag it out. I think it cooked his brain or something. Anyway, I don't know where you learned that trick, but it's great. Finally, I finished up in the usual fashion by cutting off his nuts and cramming them down his throat. He almost suffocated, so I put him on his stomach before letting the dogs after him. He lasted a few more hours and then went quiet.
Thanks again for teaching me the ropes. We're going to make these NCR motherfuckers learn the meaning of pain!
- Eileen
P.S. You said some guy from way east taught you, right? Was his name Marko? I can't remember. He must be a bad motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT:
威列特：
关于怎么玩火，你的点子是对的。我试了你的方法，真是太棒了！
那个NCR蠢猪从一开始就鬼哭狼嚎，害得我不得不割掉他的舌头。之后我就烧他的脚，等到他没有了知觉，就把烧红的那部分剁下来直接烤着吃。然后我开始尝试还没有烤过的部分，那种感觉就像刚把他抓到一样--他浑身又开始扭动起来，于是我不得不又用另一根皮带把他紧紧地拴住。
当我吃到他的膝盖时，我把他的眼皮割了下来，把他放在太阳下暴晒了好几天，然后用水浇他把他拖回来。我估计太阳已经把他脑子烤糊了。不管怎样，我不知道你从哪学到的这一招，不过别说，真棒。最后，我很绅士地把他的脂肪割了下来，塞进他的喉咙里。看着他快窒息了，我就把他的胃也割了下来，然后就让给我的狗了。他在撕咬中又蠕动了一会儿，然后走得很安静。
再次向你教我如何用绳子表示感谢。我们要让这帮NCR家伙们好好尝尝生不如死的滋味。
- 艾琳
P.S.你是不是说过这些是一个从东面来的家伙交给你的？如果我没记错的话，他的名字叫马尔科，是吗？这家伙真他妈牛逼！

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Word of Warning
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tommy,
I understand you recently left the Omerta organization under less than favorable circumstances. In the Mojave, to find yourself alone often implies extreme peril.
With that in mind, I'm willing to make you an offer. My firm specializes in contracts of a very risky, specific nature - assassination. We are always cultivating new talent, and at first glance you definitely possess the acumen for our business. I am willing to offer you a position, under one condition.
Soon you will be visited by a contractor from my rival, Randall & Associates. Killing your assailant would be conducive to your health and beneficial to my business interests. If you bring me the head of &PCName;, consider yourself hired.
It would be wise to accinge yourself for the imminent confontation - the aforementioned individual, while new to the profession, is apparently precocious and quite capable.
Sincerely, The Judge
ESP.TRADUIT:
托米：
我明白你最近为什么要离开黑手党，你现在的日子很不好过。在莫哈维，当你孤身一人时，你会发现这是一个多么困难的境地。
记住这一点后，我给你个提议。我的公司专注于非常危险的独特的合同--暗杀。我们一直在培养新的年轻人，而你，正是我们要找的这样的人。我希望你能参与到这份工作中来。
要不了多久，你会被一个我的竞争对手“兰道尔同伙会”的人拜访。把那家伙干掉，既能帮你活命，也对我们有利。只要你能把 &PCName;的头带来，我就可以正式雇用你。
你要是聪明的话，就照我说的去办。那个家伙也蛮有一套，不过我相信他不是你的对手。
真诚的， 审判官

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another Batch
ESP.TRADUIT: 又一批货

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Judge,
We finally caught a break, and next month we should get a shipment of slaves for discount rates. The NCR's presence jacks up overhead, but there's still plenty of room for profit. Luckily these Fiends only ask for drugs, and all Violet needs is sex.
I'm a little worried about &PCName;, seeing as to how nobody has taken down Randall's little protege yet. I know Javier is a scary bastard, but I don't think that kid is fucking around. I'm not questioning you, but I want to make sure our interests are protected.
Anyway, I'll pull one boy out of the batch for you, as instructed. You like them with red hair, right? It won't be a problem.
I'm holding on to that map you sent, but I'll make sure the messenger destroys it after delivering the shipment next month.
- Cormac
ESP.TRADUIT:
审判官：
我们终于可以歇一歇了。下个月，我们有一船奴隶就要到了。尽管NCR有时候会让人头疼，但这次的利润依旧很高。此外幸运的是，恶魔帮只要求些毒品，而且紫罗兰只要求性。
我唯一有些担心的是那个叫&PCName;的家伙，因为至少到现在还没有人能干掉这个兰道尔的走狗。我知道哈维尔是个胆小的蠢货，但我不认为那个家伙还能继续嚣张下去。抱歉，我不是对你质疑，我只是想确保我们共同的利益得到保护。
不管怎样，我会把这批货里的一个小鬼交给你。你喜欢红头发，对吗？
你给我的那张地图现在暂时在我手里，但我会确保它在货到后一定会及时被销毁。
- 科马克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Jack
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：杰克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Jack Race: Caucasian Allegiance/Faction: Independent Location: Goodsprings
Notes: Jack used to be "the" gunman for Heck Gunderson, but after murdering an unarmed farmer and his wife, Jack has been let go by the cattle baron. Heck is apparently making every effort to distance himself from the psychopathic pistolero. Jack is unprotected, alone, and he's threatening to spill the beans on the less savory aspects of Heck's operations. Word has it that he's drifted into Goodsprings, looking for work as a hired gun. He is very, very quick with the pistol - perhaps as fast as Doc Friday. I'd advise you to shoot first and talk later. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：杰克 种族：高加索人 派别：独立 位置：清泉镇
备注： 杰克曾经是冈德森的打手，不过在谋杀了一对手无缚鸡之力农家夫妇后，杰克被从公司里开除。冈德森希望尽全力找到这个精神错乱的凶手。杰克现在孤立无援，但他还是从某种程度上影响了冈德森公司的名誉和声望。据说他现在在清泉镇找打手的工作。他的手枪拔的非常快，和“星期五”医生有的一拼。我建议你在见到他的面之前就把枪掏出来。祝你好运。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Kurt Katil
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：科特.卡迪尔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Kurt Katil Race: Caucasian? Allegiance/Faction: Fiends Location: Camped near the Sunset Sarsaparilla Headquarters
Notes: Kurt Katil leads a band of Fiends who've been terrorizing the Westside Militia; he personally oversees the torture and mutilation of captives, and is reputed to gnaw on the intestines of living victims after disemboweling them. Like most Fiends, he's a drug-addled maniac who will shoot on sight, so don't take any chances.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：科特.卡迪尔 种族：高加索人？ 派别：恶魔帮 位置：夕阳沙士工厂附近的营地
备注： 科特.卡迪尔带领着一群恶魔帮成员，威胁着西区军队的安全。他喜好用多种方法折磨俘虏，并以热衷掏空并撕咬俘虏的内脏而臭名远扬。和其他恶魔帮成员一样，他是个毒瘾疯子，会枪杀一切出现在他眼前的陌生人，所以把握好机会。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Chuck Bowdrie
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：恰克.博迪莱

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Chuck Bowdrie Race: Caucasian Allegiance/Faction: Caesar's Legion (Recently defected from NCR) Location: Unknown
Notes: Our client (The NCR, naturally) reports that Captain Chuck Bowdrie recently defected to Caesar's Legion, but only after killing two fellow rangers while on patrol. The NCR had assigned the rangers to Bowdrie's unit in the hopes of monitoring his activities (as there was some suspicion of collusion with the Legion). Unfortunately for the rangers, Bowdrie sniffed out their true motives, and decided to jump ship in murderous fashion. He's got all kinds of dirt on the NCR, so they want him tagged and bagged. He's rumored to be making his way east in the hopes of crossing into Legion territory. He's a sneaky bastard, so watch yourself.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Chuck Bowdrie Race: Caucasian **兰道尔同伙会**
目标：恰克.博迪莱 种族：高加索人 派别：凯撒军团（最近被NCR击败） 位置：未知
备注： 我们的客户（自然是NCR）报告，上尉恰克.博迪莱最近再一次作战中打败了凯撒军团，但这之前他枪杀了两名巡逻中的士兵。NCR之后派了几名游骑兵去监视他的行动（怀疑他其实是和军团合谋）。不幸的是，博迪莱发现了他们的真实意图，并对他们进行了谋杀行为。现在他是NCR彻底的敌人，NCR希望亲眼见到他的尸体。据说他现在正朝东部移动，可能会穿过军团的领地。他是个很狡猾的家伙，所以保持警惕。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Billy Bogan
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：比利.博根

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Billy Bogan Race: Caucasian Allegiance/Faction: Independent Gang Location: North of the city?
Notes: Billy Bogan was on death row at the NCR Correctional Facility, but after the prisoner uprising he quickly absconded and set to work collecting raiders, outlaws, and other ruffians to form his new gang. His crew is rumored to be headed north, aiming to raid and pillage outside NCR territory. Our client wants him dead, along with any of his lackies. It's a mixed bunch traveling with Billy, so be ready for anything.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：比利.博根 种族：高加索人 派别：独立 位置：城市北面？
备注： 比利.博根本应该在NCR监狱被处决，但在一场监狱暴动中，他趁乱逃了出去。后来他纠集了一帮土匪、强盗，重新组成了一个帮派。他的团伙据称正在向北方移动，企图抢劫那些北面的不在NCR控制区的领地。我们的客户希望他和他的团伙尽快完蛋。这趟旅行很可能不会十分顺利，所以做好准备。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Dallas Courtright
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：达拉斯.考特莱特

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Dallas Courtright Race: Caucasian Allegiance/Faction: Regulators (Core Region) Location: Westside
Notes: I'm short on time, so this is a hasty typing job. Dallas has introduced his own brand of justice to Westside, which involves intimidating business owners into paying protection fees. You don't have to kill him - just make sure he leaves Westside. If you have to shoot it, so be it.
- Randall
P.S. Hurry back after this. There are some troubling developments with our competitor that I need to share with you.
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：达拉斯.考特莱特 种族：高加索人 派别：管理者 位置：西区
备注： 我这会儿时间紧迫，因此这封信我可能会打得比较匆忙。达拉斯把他自己对公正的理解强行带入了西区，他还要求商人们尽快支付给他保护费。这对我们社区的安定造成了严重影响。你不必杀死他，只要能确保他能离开西区就行。如果语言不管用的话，那就随便你了。
- 兰道尔
P.S.完成任务后赶快回来。我们的竞争者挑起了一些事端，有些事我须要跟你说一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall & Associates
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔同伙会

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Randall & Associates is accepting applications for the following positions: - Bounty Hunter
Job Description: Pursue high-risk bounties on behalf of various clients, utilizing any and all means to apprehend and/or terminate contracted targets.
Job Requirements: - Should have experience with firearms, explosives, or energy weapons - Must be organized and self-sufficient - Interpersonal ability is helpful, but not essential - Unarmed or Melee skills a plus - Moral Flexibility preferred
Pay/Benefits: - Work at your own pace, on your own schedule - The initial contract is 125 caps. Proven effectiveness will lead to more lucrative payments. - Potential rewards include a custom revolver and duster
To apply, see Steven Randall at the offices of Randall & Associates.
DISCLAIMER: Randall & Associates is not responsible for injuries and/or death incurred while pursuing said contracts. Randall & Associates is an equal opportunity employer.
ESP.TRADUIT:
“兰道尔同伙会”正在接收以下职位申请： - 赏金猎人
职位描述： 代表不同客户追踪具有高风险的目标，允许使用各种方法逮捕并、或击毙目标。
职位要求： - 需要对各种枪械、爆炸装置、能量武器有丰富经验 - 要绝对自律，能独立完成任务 - 人际交往能力可以为你加分，但不是必须 - 拳击或近战略知一二 - 品行端正的尤佳
支付/回报： - 遵循你自己的时间表，按自己制定的步骤完成任务 - 第一份合同250个瓶盖。如果能证明自己的能力，以后的回报会更丰富 - 潜在的奖励包括一把自定左轮和一根鸡毛掸子
想要申请，到“兰道尔同伙会”办公室会见斯蒂夫.兰道尔
声明： “兰道尔同伙会”对在执行任务过程中对执行人本身可能发生的一切后果受伤，或是死亡不承担任何责任。“兰道尔同伙会”向任何人提供机会均等的工作选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Bear's return
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊的回归

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your Honor,
I have it on good authority that Red Bear will be returning to the Mojave with a bevy of slaves. While it's likely that he'll sell most of the women to the Vipers, I could have him hold onto several of the young boys for you, if you'd like.
I appreciate your continued support for my business endeavors in the Mojave. If you should need anything at all, Shadow Company is at your service.
Sincerely, Norman Meston Commander, Shadow Company
ESP.TRADUIT:
尊敬的阁下：
我已听说，红熊将要带着一队奴隶回到莫哈维。然而看起来他似乎要把大部分女人都卖给毒蛇帮。我能说服他留几个年轻的小孩给你，如果你喜欢的话。
我高度赞赏您对我再莫哈维生意上的支持。如果您需要任何东西，幻影公司随时为您服务。
真诚的， 诺曼.梅斯顿 将军，幻影公司

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Humble Request
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个谦卑的请求

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your Honor,
I'd like to submit a target for assassination, under the usual terms (10,000 caps).
Since Doc Friday drifted into that Saloon last month, my ability to conduct raids has been seriously undermined. Last week he killed two of my best men, and morale has taken a definite turn for the worse. Ghouls like Friday are a disease, and I want him removed as soon as possible. If your men can dispose of him within the week, I'll throw in another 5,000 caps upon termination. Thank you.
Respectfully, Slade
ESP.TRADUIT:
尊敬的阁下：
我跟高兴向您提供一个可以暗杀的目标，我愿意回报给你10000个瓶盖。
自从上个月“星期五”医生闯进了沙龙，我的局面控制力与日剧减。上个星期，他杀掉了我两个最好的助手，现在我这边的士气一落千丈。像“星期五”这样的食尸鬼本身就是一种病毒，我希望他能够被尽快抹除。如果你的人可以在一个星期内干掉他，我愿意再多付5000个瓶盖。
向您表示尊敬， 斯内德
Respectfully, Slade

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warning
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Richter,
My sources indicate that Randall's nascent firm is damaging our business contacts in the Mojave, particularly since he started using &PCName;. I don't have to tell you what will happen if we continue losing revenue because of Randall's little renegade. Take care of this immediately, or Mr. Kagan himself will hear of your failure.
- Fisk
ESP.TRADUIT:
李希特：
我的消息透露，兰道尔那个新生的小公司正在对我们在莫哈维的生意开始造成威胁，尤其是在他雇佣了那个&PCName;之后。我想我不必告诉你接下来会发生什么，如果我们让这种情况持续发生下去。你要密切关注此事，卡根先生可不希望听到什么令他不开心的消息。
- 菲斯克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harmonica
ESP.TRADUIT: 口琴

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Judge,
Do you know anything about this "Harmonica" fellow? He plugged a client of mine last week, and I want to settle up with him. All I've heard is that he's some kind of psychopath, and not to be trifled with. Regardless, he owes me. If you have any information on this fellow, I'll happily compensate you.
Sincerely, Fisk
ESP.TRADUIT:
审判官，
你有没有听说过“口琴”这个家伙？上星期他把我们一个客户丢在雷区里了。我想立刻知道他在哪里。我听说他是个神经病，而且开不起玩笑。不管怎样，他欠我的。如果你有任何方面的信息，请告诉我，我很愿意给予相应补偿。
真诚的， A.曲斯林

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Favor
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮个忙

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Judge,
Sergio will be in your vicinity soon, so please give him a warm welcome.
I heard you're having some trouble with Randall and his little stooge, &PCName;, so just put Sergio on it. He really enjoys his work, so you don't have to pay him much. I've tried to teach him the value of bartering, but he stopped listening to me years ago. That's how it goes with brothers, I guess. Maybe you can talk some sense into him.
- Marko
ESP.TRADUIT:
塞尔吉奥不久就要到了，请向他表示欢迎。
我听说你和兰道尔，以及那个&PCName;之间有些不快，请让塞尔吉奥来处理这件事。他对干类似这样的事情乐在其中，所以你不必付给他钱。我曾经试着教他生意谈判的技巧，他总是只听了一会儿就会双手捂住耳朵。这大概就是兄弟之间常见的情况吧，我猜。或许你可以和他深入聊聊。
- 马尔科

ESP.ORIGINAL: Denton
ESP.TRADUIT: 丹顿

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Judge,
I'm looking for a man by the name of CJ Denton. He possesses something of great value to me, and I need to acquire it at all costs. For several years Denton has evaded me, and therefore I'm willing to offer a substantial sum if you capture him alive. Thank you.
Sincerely, Wagner
ESP.TRADUIT:
审判官：
我正在寻找一个叫CJ.丹顿的人。他占有了一些对我来说很有价值的东西，我愿意不惜一切待嫁夺回它们。这些年来，丹顿一直躲着我，因此我愿意向你支付一大笔钱，如果你帮我把它活捉的话。谢谢你。
真诚的， 瓦格纳

ESP.ORIGINAL: To Jane
ESP.TRADUIT: 给简的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jane,
I doubt this note will ever reach you. I was arrogant to think I could just strike out alone and make everything right. I failed at so many things, I just wanted to succeed for once. Eric was always better than me. I'm ashamed to admit it, but I was almost happy when he went missing - it showed everybody he was human, and they had to rely on me. I went from being an inept deputy to the Sheriff overnight. It looked for a minute like we wouldn't have to sneak anymore, but could live our dream, thanks to chance.
But here I am, stripped and freezing in this goddamn dungeon. I had been wandering for days, and I couldn't believe my good fortune in finding this place. The sick old bastard gassed me, I bet. I saw what he did to Eric, and it's not going to happen to me, to be damn sure.
I'm sorry everything happened like this. Tell Paul I love him, but don't ever tell him about us. If you ever get this letter, just know that my last thoughts were on you, and that it was quick.
Love, Bob
P.S. When Paul is old enough, please tell him that I'm his father. He may never understand, but he deserves the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT:
简：
我不知道你能不能读到这封信。我曾经如此自大，认为我的能力可以超过周围任何人，每件事都能尽善尽美。但我错了，已经跌倒了无数次了，甚至能成功一次现在都成为一种渴求。艾里克在很多方面都做得比我好，我很羞愧地承认这一点，而当我听到他消失的那一刻我甚至是如此的高兴--这证明了他也是个普通人，现在大家需要依靠我了。我一夜之间就从原来的无所适从成为了警长。那一刻，我觉得自己像在梦中一样，仿佛交了天大的好运。
但是现在，我被困在这个冰冷的地牢里，身上的衣服也被扒得精光。我这些天百思不得其解，为什么我的好运会带我来到这个地方。那个灯光下又老又丑的混蛋可能想用毒气毒死我。我曾看见他就是这么这么害死艾里克的。不过这肯定不会发生在我身上，肯定不会！
我很抱歉发生了这一切。告诉保罗，我爱他，但不要告诉他关于我们的事。如果你看到这封信，你要知道，在这最后的时刻，我的心里一直都想着你。虽然大概不会持续很长时间，但是，我一直很想你。
爱你的， 鲍勃
P.S.当保罗长大以后，告诉他，我是他的父亲。他或许永远也不明白，但他值得知道真相。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Brother's Killer
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死你兄弟的凶手

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Motorhead,
I was just as devastated by the death of your brother as anyone else in the Mojave Wasteland. He was an invaluable business partner.
I understand you've been looking for information on the killer, and in light of our relationship I took it upon myself to assist you in this endeavor.
&pcname; is ostensibly the perpetrator, likely contracted by the NCR. It is rumored that &pcname; is also pursuing bounties for Randall & Associates, and will be entering your territory shortly in pursuit of Eileen, another NCR target.
I hope that this information is helpful in your quest for justice. Good luck.
Sincerely, Judge Richter
ESP.TRADUIT:
摩托头：
如同莫哈维废土上的其他人一样，我对你兄弟的死感到莫大的悲伤。他是如此有价值的一个生意伙伴。
我知道你一直在寻找有关凶手的信息。看在我和你兄弟关系的情面上，我愿意尽我全力帮你渡过难关。
&pcname;，这家伙就是这一切背后的罪犯，NCR也略有牵连。据说&pcname;在为“兰道尔同伙会”工作，而且不久后就会进入你的领地，追踪一个叫艾琳的人，而这个艾琳同时也是NCR的目标。
我希望这些信息对你追求正义的决心有所帮助。祝你好运。
真诚的， 审判官李希特

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRandallSafeNoteBackup

Coyote,
After your inquiry into the paucity of contracts of late, I investigated the matter in full.
It's come to my attention that a new firm, "Randall & Associates" has been utilizing &pcname;, an up and coming contractor in the Mojave.
Your unquestioning loyalty and determination to see the success of our organization is appreciated, so consider this information a token of our continuing partnership. I trust you will deal with the matter shortly.
Sincerely, Judge Richter
ESP.TRADUIT:
野狼：
自从你询问最近合同大量减少的原因，我便开始展开全面调查。
有一家新公司引起了我的注意，“兰道尔同伙会”。他们还雇佣了一个叫&pcname;的家伙，这家伙的阅历我调查之后发现也不过就是只嫩鸡。
你不容置疑的忠诚和果断见证了我们事业的成功。现在，这个情况摆在我们面前，又到了是你拿出点决定的时候了。我相信你能很快处理好这个问题。
真诚的， 审判官李希特

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Dead
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔的遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear &PCName;.
If you're reading this, then I'm probably dead or kidnapped. I haven't been forthright about recent developments in the business, because I never wanted to get you mixed up in my bullshit, kid.
Nonetheless, here we are. You're probably wondering who the fuck would kill me, and to be honest, I can only speculate. However, I'll offer the prognostication for my untimely demise: recently, Randall & Associates has been cutting into the market share of Richter & Associates, a bounty hunting firm with a penchant for brutality. It is headed by a shadowy figure known simply as "The Judge". I don't know much about the man, but I'm willing to bet he's the person who's had me knocked off. I assume you've dealt with his assassin, the humorless Mr. Sugar. I've blown off the initial advances by the Judge's cronies, so it's only a matter of time before he uses force. I'm probably just being paranoid.
Anyway, if you are reading this, I want you to know you're the best goddamn bounty hunter I ever had the pleasure of working with, although I'll never tell you as long as I'm alive. I want you to take all the caps, but there's something else. There's a .44 revolver in the safe that I call "Sweet Revenge". It was manufactured a long time ago, well before the war. I swore I would never fire it until I found Marko, the man who butchered my family back east. You're all I've got left, kid, so take it. Better yet, take it and go kill the assholes who put me in the ground!
Cormac, the Judge's chief slave trader, is a liason to the Fiends. If you find Cormac, you'll find the way to the Judge. Last I heard, he was shacked up with Violet.
There's one last thing: swear to me, here and now, that no matter what happens, you'll find Marko and kill him for me, and everyone else he's taken from. I know the Judge is going to be in your crosshairs, but that was strictly business, and I came to accept such risks long ago. Know this: when Marko dies a violent, painful death, my soul will be at rest. Until that day, I'll do my best to haunt your ass!
It was a privilege to work with you, kid. Remember: Justice is truth in action. Let that guide you in the coming days.
Sincerely, Steven Randall
P.S. If you ever come across a Marshall named Cooper, give him my regards.
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的&PCName;：
如果你正在读这封信，那么我可能已经死了。我对最近我们生意上的进展并不向你坦率，是因为我不想把你带进这个火坑，我的孩子。
尽管如此，我们还是走到这一步了。你可能在想，是谁他妈的杀了我。实话实说，我自己也只能推测，但是，我的突然死亡是有征兆的：最近，我们兰道尔同伙会的市场份额正在被另一个赏金猎人公司，野蛮粗鲁的李希特同伙会抢夺。这家公司隐藏在幕后的头头据说是一个叫“审判官”的家伙。我对这个家伙不太了解，但我打赌，我要是死了的话也一定会死在他的手上。我猜你已经见过他的一个刺客了--糖先生。 我在生意上的某些方面已经失了先机，审判官何时动用武力也只是个时间上的问题。 我可能有些偏执狂了。
总之，如果你正在读这封信，我想告诉你，你是与我合作过的他妈的最好的赏金猎人，尽管在我活着的时候我不会跟你说这些话。我把我的钱都留给你了。当然，我还要提一样东西，在我的保险箱里有一把.44左轮手枪，我称它为“甜蜜的复仇”。这把枪是在很久以前生产的。这么多年来我一直舍不得用它，因为这是为日后向杀死我家人的那个叫马可的屠夫复仇留着的。现在你就是我的全部，孩子，这把枪你拿走吧。最好能用它宰掉干掉我的家伙！
科马克，审判官的奴隶贸易主管，暗地里也负责组织联络任务。找到他，你就能找到审判官。
最后还有一件事：向我发誓，就在这，现在，不论发生什么，你都要帮我找到马尔科，帮我复仇，帮所有受他所害的人复仇。我知道，审判官一定会死于你的枪口，但这只是生意，我很久以来就知道自己要为此承担风险。记住：只有让马尔科下地狱，我的灵魂才能安息。否则，不到他死的那一天，我的灵魂不会停止骚扰你！
能与你一起共事过，这是我的荣幸，孩子。记住：公正不是光靠嘴皮子就能实现的。望这句话日后能被你铭记在心。
真心祝愿， 斯蒂夫·兰道尔
P.S. 如果你能碰到一个叫库珀·马歇尔的人，请向他表示一下我的问候。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warning
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sergio,
Your little brother plays a mean harmonica.
- Frank
ESP.TRADUIT:
塞尔吉奥：
你小弟的口琴似乎吹得很平庸啊。
- 弗兰克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your purchase
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您的惠顾

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Idaho,
I'd like to personally thank you for your recent purchase. We stand by our pledge to provide you reliable, economic tools to ensure stability and control in your place of business.
A new feature of the SS-250 model is its nifty fail-deadly protocol; should any calamity befall you, all your property would justly perish as well. This is the latest and most effective measure against the violent impulses of human property.
Please contact us if the product is defective or unsatisfactory in any way.
Sincerely, E. Jones President, Servitude Solutions, Inc.
ESP.TRADUIT:
爱达荷先生：
我仅以个人名义向你最近的购买表示感谢。我们保证，可以向你提供可靠的经济工具来帮助你稳定和控制你的生意。
SS-250模型的一个新特征就是它的一个极好的“保护”协议：如果有不幸发生在你身上时，你的财产也会同时全部毁灭。这是来避免个人财产受到严重冲击的最新的而且最有效的方法。
如果你发现这个产品有任何缺陷或令人不满意的地方，请及时和我们联系。
真诚的， E.琼斯 董事长，奴役百事通 公司

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whore!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妓女！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Maude you old fuckingcuntbitchslutass cock burning scream! Whore! Whore! Whore! Scratching, burning, fondle, voices talking, crying, beckoning!
Beckoning!
Beckoning!
Beckoning!
Alhazred speaks!
ESP.TRADUIT:
这里没有你做不到的，只有你想不到！妓女！妓女！皮鞭，暴力，道具，口X，快来！！
来吧！
来吧！
来吧！
阿尔哈兹雷德告诉你！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Tom Quigley
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：汤姆.奎格雷

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Quigley, Tom Race: Caucasian Allegiance/Faction: Former NCR Ranger Location: Foothills west of the Poseidon Gas Station
Notes: Quigley was discharged from the Rangers on psychological grounds (Section 8, I believe). It's rumored his neurosis was caused by syphilis. After he slipped into insanity, Quigley began using his tremendous abilities with the rifle to arbitrarily slaughter convoys and passers by. The NCR and Crimson Caravan want him gone ASAP.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：汤姆.奎格雷 种族：高加索人 派别：前NCR游骑兵 位置：波塞冬加油站西边的小山
备注： 奎格雷已因为心理问题被游骑兵开除。据说他的神经因为梅毒受到伤害。自从他陷入疯狂之后，奎格雷开始肆意任为，疯狂地射击迫害路过的护卫或旅客。NCR和赤红商队希望尽快让他滚蛋。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Unknown
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：未知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Unknown Race: Unknown Allegiance/Faction: Unknown Location: Unknown
Notes: This is a vague target, but there's been a clear pattern of attacks up north. Our best contact is a caravan guard named Chesty. He survived one of the ambushes and got a clear look at the assailants. Unfortunately he's a drunk who spends his days at the bar in Boulder City. Regardless, he's our best shot at the bounty, so look him up.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：未知 种族：未知 派别：未知 位置：未知
备注： 这是一个模糊的目标，但在北面确实发生过一些战斗。可以联系中间人切斯蒂。他从一次埋伏中幸运逃生，并清楚地看到了对方的脸。不幸的是，他是个酒鬼，一天到晚闷在巨岩城的酒吧里。不管怎样，他会对你有所帮助，赶快去找他吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Eileen
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：未知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Eileen Race: Caucasian Allegiance/Faction: Fiends Location: Fiend Territory, near Vault 3
Notes: Eileen is suspected to have captured, tortured, and murdered at least a dozen NCR soldiers in the past year alone. She's skilled with a blade, and takes pleasure in mutilating the genitals of captured men. One source reports that she's made a "cock necklace" out of dicks taken from prisoners. Oh, and she eats her victims, too.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：艾琳 种族：高加索人 派别：恶魔帮 位置：恶魔帮领地，靠近3号避难所
备注： 艾琳被怀疑在过去的这一年里绑架、折磨、谋杀了至少一打NCR士兵。她很善于用刀，以阉割被绑男人的生殖器为乐。有消息说，她把那些割下来的JJ穿成了一个项链戴在脖子上。哦，对了，据说她还会吃那些受害者的尸体。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Cullen
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：卡伦

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Cullen Race: Caucasian Allegiance/Faction: Jackals Location: Nevada Highway Patrol Station
Notes: Under Cullen's spirited leadership, the typically timid Jackals are rediscovering their backbone. Their young leader has developed a habit for conducting brazen attacks on convoys, which is deleterious for commerce. If money talks, our client is practically screaming; eliminate Cullen and the firm will get a much-needed fiscal injection.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：卡伦 种族：高加索人 派别：豹狼帮 位置：内华达高速公路巡逻站
备注： 在卡伦富有精神力的领导下，以前畏畏缩缩的豹狼帮现在开始四处活跃起来。这个年轻的领导人带领他们四处攻击商队，这对内华达的商业发展是个严重危险的信号。让金钱来说话，我们的客户只有一点要求：卡伦一帮的消失是世界上最美妙的福音。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Tony Idaho
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：托尼.爱达荷

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Tony Idaho Race: Hispanic Allegiance/Faction: Independent Location: Near Clark Field
Notes: Tony is the newest presence in the Mojave drug trade, and he's quickly established himself as a man who refuses to break his balls or his word - for anyone. He's almost a victim of his own success - he's put more drugs on the market at cheaper rates than anyone else, and this has perturbed the competition (the Khans, primarily). It's not just the Khans, however - Tony was benefiting from a deal with an underground supplier named Alexander, not to mention slave labor. Recently Tony and Alexander had a falling out, or as Alex said, "Tony tried to fuck me". In the midst of all this fucking, heads are going to roll, starting with Mr. Idaho. His drug den is a bunker near Clark field that keeps an armed guard 24/7. Have a plan before you try to infiltrate the place - my source says Tony keeps a suped-up carbine on his person all the time, even in his sleep. Be safe and keep your head down.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：托尼.爱达荷 种族：西班牙人 派别：独立 位置：靠近克拉克机场
备注： 托尼是最近才出现在莫哈维毒品市场里的一个家伙，但迅速向别人证明了他不是个软蛋。他在市场上的售价比任何人都要低。这种严重扰乱现有贸易秩序的行为把自己推向了一个危险的境地，大汗帮对此表示非常生气。托尼从与一个名叫亚历山大的地下商人交易那里收益颇丰，不用说是奴隶贸易。最近，两个人关系蹦了，亚历山大说：“那个托尼真你妈操蛋。”托尼好像是对他预谋不轨。现在，据说托尼的巢穴在克拉克机场附近，还有守卫守护。在渗入前你需要精细准备，我的消息说，他随身带一把小口径卡宾枪，即使睡觉的时候也不例外。保持警惕，谨慎小心。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty: Tommy
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏：汤米

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**PROPERTY OF RANDALL & ASSOCIATES**
Target: Tommy Race: Caucasian Allegiance/Faction: Omertas Location: Tumbleweed Ranch (Supposedly)
Notes: Tommy worked as muscle for the Omertas for years until last week, when he killed another "associate" over a verbal altercation involving shoes (or was it a shinebox? I can't remember - it seems trivial to kill someone over such a thing). Anyway, Tommy killed a "made" guy with plenty of witnesses, so he's got to go. The Omertas want an outsider to handle this, and thanks to you we've established the firm as the go-to for expedient termination, so we got the job. Tommy was always hopped up on psycho and jet, so be careful - he's definitely not one for conversation. My advice is to go in guns blazing and don't give him a chance to return fire. Good luck.
- Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
**兰道尔同伙会**
目标：汤米 种族：高加索人 派别：黑手党 位置：荒野牧场（估计）
备注： 汤米直到上星期前，作为黑手党的左臂右膀已经好多年了，但他在上星期因为一场因鞋子而爆发的争吵中开枪打死了另一个同伙会的成员。因为此举被很多路人当场目击，他必须受到惩罚。黑手党希望这件事情由一个外人来解决。正因为有你的努力，我们公司才获得了不错的名声，也因此得到了这项生意。汤米喜欢嗑疯狂药和杰特，他不是一个保守的人。我的建议是快速把他解决掉，不要留给她任何喘息机会。祝你好运。
- 兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, welcome to Randall and Associates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，欢迎来到“兰道尔同伙会”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Steven Randall, owner and operator. I assume you're here for the position, correct?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我介绍我自己。我叫斯蒂夫.兰道尔，这里的所有者和主管。我猜你来这里是应聘职位的，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaBounties01 4 4
I'm getting impatient. Are you ready to work or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我快不耐烦了。你准备好开始工作了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_000021DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you killed Quigley Yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀死奎格雷了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_000021E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready for the next bounty, kid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好下一个赏金任务了吗，小子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_000024C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What... can you buy me a drink? Just one drink...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么……你可以给我买杯酒吗？一杯就行……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chesty [02005222] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00005224_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To what do I owe the extreme pleasure of this surprising visit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我应该把什么归功于这如此令人惊喜的会面？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0200CA5F] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000CA6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 67 set aaBounties01.AlexGreeted to 2
Is the convoy attacker dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 袭击警卫的人死了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_000024D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready for another job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好下一个工作了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00002D6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My head... ringing... it hurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的头……铃铃地响……有点疼

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... you're that bounty hunter, right? Thank God you're here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你就是那个赏金猎人，对吧？感谢上帝你来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0200CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld01\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000CA58_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cullen [02003058] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult03\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000333A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.CullenGreeted to 2
Collecting another one of my bounties, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又搞定了一个悬赏，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00006EDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're taking a bite out of my income, kid. I want my ends, right now, or it's your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你都快让我自己赚不到钱了，孩子。我要我的那份，否则，就要你的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00006EDA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fork it over, right now. 1,000 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把钱交出来，就现在，1000个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00006EDA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.CoyoteGreeted to 2
I'm not feeling too good...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉不妙……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chesty [02005222] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00006ED5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you kill Eileen?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000361C_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能和你说话。托尼在看我们！

Tony should be in his quarters, down the hall and to the right.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got another bounty lined up if you're ready.

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a shame that Vulpes was felled by such lowly scum.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back already? Did you blow all the caps gambling, or was it the hookers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这么快就回来工作了？你是把瓶盖都喂给老虎机了？还是说都花在女人身上了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter, so long as you're able to work. Are you up for the next job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这没关系，只要你还能继续工作就行。准备好下一项工作了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000CA51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, is Alex dead yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，艾利克斯已经死了？

ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，伙计，发生什么事了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, man, I need to lay down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，伙计，我需要躺下休息休息。

ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经找到托马斯了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid he was unwilling to accept the truth... his death was a necessity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恐怕你不愿意接受这个事实……他的死是个必然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000628E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume you must be some manner of hired gun. Are you here to enact justice? What would a smoothskin like you know about justice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，你是谁雇来的枪手对吧？你来这干什么，为了扮演正义英雄？你个滑皮，你知道什么是正义么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000628E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.FredGreeted to 2
There's another contract ready, and it pays well, my friend. Ready to get after it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又一项合同，支付很丰盛，我的朋友。准备好了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00007105_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, traveller, welcome to my humble abode!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，旅行者，欢迎来到我这卑微的小屋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000757C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, help yourself to the food. You must be famished!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请，请随便享用这里的食物。你一定饿坏了吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000757C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 2
I hope you've enjoyed the rest, friend. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能尽情享受这些，我的朋友。我还能为你做什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000759E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you're awake. You're even more vigorous than I had anticipated. Very good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你醒了，你精力旺盛得真令人出意料。不过，这样很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties01_GREETING_00007B60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 7
It's time, my friend. Any last words?
ESP.TRADUIT: 时候到了，我的朋友。还有什么遗言？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties01_GREETING_00007BA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 13
Did you find out who's behind the disappearances?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现是谁制造了这些失踪事件了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000B64D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a lucrative bounty if you're ready for work. How bout it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个双赢的悬赏任务，怎么样，愿不愿意来试试？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000B661_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're dumber than you look, kid. Did you really expect to get the drop on a seasoned ranger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可真是个傻帽，小子。你觉得凭你就可以从我这个经验老道的游骑兵这儿得到什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck Bowdrie [0200CDC6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000CDD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I'm not here to talk. Close your eyes, kid. I'll make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我来这不是来聊天的。闭上眼睛，小鬼，我会让你痛快点的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck Bowdrie [0200CDC6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000CDD4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.ChuckGreeted to 2 startcombat player aaChuckRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaChuckLegionary1Ref.startcombat player aaChuckLegionary2Ref.startcombat player aaChuckLegionary1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaChuckLegionary2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaChuckRef.setav aggression 2 aaChuckLegionary1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaChuckLegionary2Ref.setav aggression 2
Well, if it isn't the courier turned bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这不是那为刚转职的邮递员先生么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0200B653] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000B659_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you're making quite a mark in the Mojave. I applaud you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你在莫哈维现在有了一番名气。我向你表示祝贺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0200B653] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000B659_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I assume you're here for the bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我猜你就是为了我才来这的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0200B653] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000B659_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old man Gunderson is going soft, I'm afraid. He'd have nothing if it weren't for me and this pistol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恐怕老冈德森脑子已经不转弯了。如果当年不是我和这把老枪，他恐怕如今什么也得不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0200B653] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000B659_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as for you... I think Randall & Associates are trash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你嘛……我看“兰道尔同伙会”也就是个垃圾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0200B653] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000B659_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, every bounty hunter they've sent after me has been trash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，在你之前，他们派来的每一个赏金猎人对我来说都是一坨废物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0200B653] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000B659_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that pretty much makes you trash as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你，跟那些废物比还差远了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0200B653] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000B659_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.JackGreeted to 2
You got a lot to answer for, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须回答我每一个问题，你个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000EB15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Luke McCaffery, and these are my brothers, Dan and Jesse. We're here on account of our late brother, Caleb McCaffery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫卢克.麦卡菲，这些是我的兄弟，丹和杰斯。我们来这儿是因为我们大哥，凯勒.麦卡菲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000EB15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word has it that you killed our brother. Is that true? What have you got to say for yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说是你杀了他，是不是？你有什么要辩解的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000EB15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.LukeGreeted to 2
What can I do for you, citizen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮你做什么，公民？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000EAFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.DallasGreeted to 1
You again, eh? I ain't leaving. Better yet, you better get the fuck out of here before I start regulating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你，啊？我不会走的。但你最好在我开始掌控这里之前赶快滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000EB00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you kill Jack yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了杰克了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000BC35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you take care of Kurt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你搞定科特了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000CDC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Chuck dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恰克死了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000CDD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you take care of Billy and his gang?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你搞定比利和他的人了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000EAEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a contract on a crazy fiend. You ready for another job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得到了一个新的悬赏，有关于一个疯狂的恶魔帮的人。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000BC39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR needs help tracking down a defector. You ready to work?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR需要帮助，追查一个叛徒。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000CDD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's another bounty, if you're here to work. How bout it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又有一个悬赏了，你准备好了就跟我说一声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000E7C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bounty in Westside. You ready to work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 西区有一个悬赏目标，感兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000EAF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You found the note. Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到那笔记了。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000EB2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know why I'm here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道为什么我来这吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_0000EB2B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.SugarGreeted to 1
Speak to the Judge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去和审判官说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guard [02011A7D] (mod) NPC : Guard [02011A81] (mod) NPC : Guard [02011A85] (mod) NPC : Bodyguard [02011A89] (mod) NPC : Bodyguard [02011A8C] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00011D7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your arrival is well-timed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来的正是时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00011D7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your restraint is noted. Most in your position would have swept into these chambers with little mind to dialogue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我注意到你有在克制自己，不简单。从事你这类职业的人，大多都只会只会没头脑地冲进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00011D7D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.JudgeGreeted to 1
Go on in. The Judge is expecting you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进去吧。审判官在里面等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guard [02011A7B] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00013765_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.SentryGreeted to 1
Are you ready to make the commitment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好接受委任了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00019328_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready to work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好开始工作了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GREETING_00003621_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_HELLO_00023134_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一会见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_GOODBYE_00023135_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a good thing I saved my appetite!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息是我现在饿的很呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties01_Attack_000222E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you can kill me? You can't kill shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你能杀了我？你他妈屁都杀不了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cullen [02003058] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult03\aaBounties01_Attack_000222CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to make sure you burn for this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要给你开个大洞！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cullen [02003058] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult03\aaBounties01_Attack_000222CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's regulating time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是杀戮时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Attack_000222D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't wait to peel off that skin of yours!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经等不及要把你的皮扒下了啦！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties01_Attack_000222D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freddy's coming for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗莱迪来找你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties01_Attack_000222D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a fucking coward!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个懦夫！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Attack_000222D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: End of the line for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你的结局！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties01_Attack_000222DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This one's for my brother!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一枪是为我的兄弟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties01_Attack_000222DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet your destiny!
ESP.TRADUIT: 面对疾风吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Attack_000236F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is your end!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你的终点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Attack_000236F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll sentence you to death!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这就送你去死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Attack_000236F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel my wrath!
ESP.TRADUIT: 感受我的愤怒吧!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Attack_000236F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The things I'm gonna do to your fucking corpse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这就把你变成尸体！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Attack_000236F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should have known who you're messing with!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该知道你面对的是谁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties01_Attack_000222DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hit
You insolent, little fool!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这傲慢的小傻瓜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties01_Hit_000222E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking asshole!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天杀的王八蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cullen [02003058] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult03\aaBounties01_Hit_000222CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hit noise}<Grunting>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Hit_000222CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Hit_000222CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you'll pay for that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦槽，你要为此付出代价！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Hit_000222D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Grunting}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties01_Hit_000222D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Grunting}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties01_Hit_000222D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I felt that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我会怕痛吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties01_Hit_000222D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucky shot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 打的好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties01_Hit_000222DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will never die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是不灭的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Hit_000236F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties01_Hit_000222DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Death
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dying}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties01_Death_000222D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dying}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties01_Death_000222DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dying}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties01_Death_000222E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dying}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties01_Death_000236F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: CombatToLost
I can smell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以闻到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties01_CombatToLost_000222D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SpeechChallengeFailure
That's not of your goddamn business. I didn't ask about that scar on your head, or where you came from, right? Don't ask dumb fucking questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这关你屁事啊。我可不关心你头上的伤口是怎么回事，也不关心你从哪来。别再问这些傻逼问题了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's good, but I need to be up front with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，但是有些话要先说在前面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be pursuing high-risk bounties. Many of the targets are extremely dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要追踪的都是些高风险目标，而且大部分悬赏对象都极其危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021D8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But with the high stakes comes increased rewards. There's cash for every bounty, and increased payment as you complete more contracts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但高风险就有高回报。每一个悬赏目标都有对应报酬，你干的越多，拿的钱也越多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021D8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's quick money in bounties, but you can rapidly make a name for yourself, and a lot of people will be looking for payback.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想通过做赏金猎人来赚钱很，但这能为你很快赢得名声，然后就会有开始盯上你的脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your decision? Are you still ready to pursue the bounties?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，告诉我你的决定，你是否准备好开始你的赏金之旅？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021D8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.InterviewFailed to 5
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then stop wasting my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么别再浪费我的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.RandallGreeted to 1 set aaBounties01.InterviewFailed to 5
I'm up for anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我已经做好一切准备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your first target is Tom Quigley, a former NCR ranger who's rumored to be the best marksman in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的第一个目标是汤姆.奎格雷，一个前NCR游骑兵，据说是在莫哈维最好的神枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties
Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently he contracted syphilis and steadily lost his fucking mind. Despite his abilities with a rifle, he was drummed out of the rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，由于他不幸染上了梅毒，他的心智开始一点一点地丧失。尽管他枪械能力出众，但他还是被逐出了游骑兵队伍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021DD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He eventually turned to banditry and murder, taking great pleasure in sniping Brahmin caravans from afar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他后来成了一个孤独的强盗，喜欢远距离狙杀商队马车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021DD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quigley's crazy, but he's still damn lethal. He's usually camped out in the hills west of the old Poseidon Gas Station. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然奎格雷已经发疯了，但他的实力却依旧不能小觑。他经常在老波塞冬加油站西边的山上宿营。还有什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021DD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.RandallGreeted to 2 player.additem bountyhunterduster 1 player.removeitem aaBounties01HiringModule 1 player.additem aaQuigleyBounty 1
No, I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我已经做好准备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Bring back Quigley's trigger finger as proof and you'll get the bounty. Just don't get killed out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。把奎格雷的手指带回来作为证明，你就可以获得报酬了。小心不要被他杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 5
What's up with the mask?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要带个面具？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who do you work for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为谁工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's for me to know and you to find out. Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就有待于我和你共同去找出答案了。还有什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000021E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take that finger. Here's your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把手指给我。这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Qui_000024C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's plenty of bounties left, so come back when you're ready to put in more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这还有大量的赏金任务。当你准备好了就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Qui_000024C6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaQuigleyFinger 1 player.additem caps001 125 SetObjectiveCompleted aaBounties01 10 10 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 5 set aaBounties01.RandallGreeted to 5
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck are you waiting for? Get out there and kill him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你还在等什么？快去把他杀了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Qui_000024C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last week a caravan was waylaid north of town, but it's still a mystery who was behind the attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上个星期，一个商队在小镇北面被埋伏了。但是谁发起了这次攻击还是个谜团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the guards survived with a leg injury, but by all accounts he's a drunken ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个护卫幸存下来了，好像只是腿上受了点轻伤。但他却是个十足的酒鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: His name is Chesty, and he spends his days at the bar in Boulder City. Find this guy and try to figure out what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字叫切斯蒂，他一天到晚窝在巨岩城的一个酒吧里。找到那个家伙，向他问清楚当时究竟发生了什么事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our client is offering 500 caps for the apprehension or termination of the attacker, provided we get definitive proof. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的客户愿意为彻底终结这些袭击行动支付500个瓶盖，前提是我们能提供给他们证明。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.RandallGreeted to 6 setstage aaBounties01 15 player.additem aaOnodaBounty 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then Piss off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就滚开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_000024CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here's your reward. Don't spend it all in one place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，这是你的报酬。记得别把鸡蛋都放在一个篮子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ono_000024D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back when you're ready for the next job. Someone is always in need of killin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你准备好开始下个工作后就回来吧。替人杀人这项工作在世界绝对少不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ono_000024D4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 15 player.removeitem aaOnodaFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500 SetObjectiveCompleted aaBounties01 20 20 player.removeitem aaQuantrillDiaryNotes 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then quit pussyfooting around here and go kill that motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么别再消极待工了，去把那个家伙杀掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ono_000024D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I like to hear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才像话嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00002D71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our client is offering 1,000 caps for this next target, and after hearing about her misdeeds, I understood why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的客户愿意为这下个目标支付1000个瓶盖。在听到她的罪行后，我终于理解这么慷慨的原因了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00002D71_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bounty is on a fiend named Eileen. She's a vicious twat with a reputation for castrating male captives and consuming their flesh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的客户愿意为这下个目标支付1000个瓶盖。在听到她的罪行后，我终于理解这么慷慨的原因了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00002D71_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suffice to say her activities are detrimental to troop morale. The payout is big on this one, so bury that sick bitch and head back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的客户愿意为这下个目标支付1000个瓶盖。在听到她的罪行后，我终于理解这么慷慨的原因了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00002D71_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 25 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 20 player.additem aaEileenBounty 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back when you've got your shit together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你把这些破事都解决了再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00002D70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bounty on your head. I'm here to collect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脑袋值一大笔钱，我来取你的人头了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna be collecting your ass! Nobody fucks with the Jackals!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你带着你自己的屁股去见阎王吧！没人敢他妈的惹豺狼帮!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cullen [02003058] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult03\aaBounties_aaBounties01Cul_0000333C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I think every member of the male species is sleeping a little easier with that bitch dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。相信她的死可以让每一种雄性动物都能睡个安稳的好觉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ken_00003620_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 30 30 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 30 player.removeitem aaEileenFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1000
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get the fuck out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就滚开去工作！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ken_0000361F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, this next bastard has it comin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，那么下一个混蛋要开始倒霉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00003624_1.ogg
