ESP.ORIGINAL: His name is Cullen, and he's the new leader of the Jackals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字叫卡伦，现在他是豹狼帮的新领导人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00003624_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years the NCR has kicked the shit out of the Jackals, but since the Republic is occupied with Caesar, the raiders are recuperating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些年，NCR一直试图把豹狼帮赶出这一带。但自从共和国被凯撒占领了一部分领土，这帮土匪的实力开始慢慢恢复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00003624_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even the sorry-ass Jackals are getting back on their feet, thanks to the charismatic Mr. Cullen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使那些曾经溜号的帮员也都回来了，这些都是因为那个新领导卡伦的功劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00003624_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's been responsible for numerous attacks on the roads south of Vegas, and he's developed a reputation for brutality and cunning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他要为在维加斯南面的路上发生的大量袭击事件负责。他已经因为残暴和狡猾而名声在外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00003624_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In short, his attacks are bad for business, so certain people want him removed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 短时间内，他的袭击行动对莫哈维的商业发展肯定会造成恶劣的影响。所以有很多人都希望把他从莫哈维抹掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00003624_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's hiding out at that old police station south of town. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有消息说他经常藏身在小镇南方的一个旧警局里。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00003624_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 35 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 35 player.additem aaCullenBounty 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then let me type in peace, jackass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就让我安静地打字，混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00003625_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, if it's still open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，如果这个职位依旧开放的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yes, it's open. I can begin the interview if you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然还是开放的了。如果你准备好了，那么我们现在就开始面试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ini_000051D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only have one question - are you willing to kill people for money? Yes or no?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只有一个问题——你是否愿意为钱去杀人？是，还是，否？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ini_000051D4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.RandallGreeted to 1
On second thought, I'm not ready for the interview.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，我还没有准备好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the strongest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是最强悍的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always get the jump on my enemies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能很远的距离就听到他们脚步声。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can outlast them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以比他们活得更长久。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want someone with people skills, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要有人际交往能耐的人，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because the mind is the most dangerous weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为智慧是厉害的武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm quicker than a cat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我比猫还灵敏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The race is not to the swift, nor battle to the strong; but time and chance happeneth to them all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最强壮的身躯不一定能赢得战争，机遇与时间则是决定胜利的关键。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a distinguished marksman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个出色的神枪手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still prefer the sword to the pen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比起笔来，我更喜欢刀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can kill anyone with my bare hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我徒手就能杀人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get started as a bounty hunter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎样开始赏金猎人这一生涯的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a relative newcomer to Vegas. I grew up far, far to the east. My parents were Brahmin herders somewhere near the Mississippi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我其实才来维加斯没多久。我在很远很远的东方长大。我的父母在靠近密西西比附近从事养牛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never figured to be a violent man. I hardly shot a gun until I was in my 20's. I just wanted to raise my own family in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没想到自己将来会与暴力挂钩。我直到20岁才勉强第一次开枪。我只想安安稳稳地组建我自己的家庭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000051F2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day a man came calling. He offered to help with chores, and he seemed sincere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一天，一个男人主动上门。他说他可以做些零工活，而且他看起来很真诚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000051F2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a big help for several days, so I let my guard down. He clubbed me in my sleep, and tied and gagged me. Then... he made me watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在刚开始的几天确实带给我家带来很大的帮助，于是我没有让警卫继续盯着他。可他在等我睡着后把我敲晕了，绑得紧紧的，并在我嘴里塞满了棉花。接下来……我就成“观众”了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: He raped my wife right in front of me. Then he cut her open, pulled the baby right out of her belly, and butchered it right there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在我面前强奸了我的妻子。然后他把她肚子刨开，从她的腹部取出了我们的孩子，又当着我的面把他也剁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000051F2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He carved off most of my face, and then he left me for dead. That was 15 years ago. I've been searching for him ever since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在我的脸上划了一道又一道，然后他就撇下我走了，任我自生自灭。那是15年前的事了。从那时起，我就开始日复一日地寻找这个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000051F2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years he was always two steps ahead, preying on families in isolated areas and repeating his crimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么长时间以来，他总是走在我前面，在其他一些相对孤立的地方继续重复他那恶毒的罪行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000051F2_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few years ago I heard he had a run-in with the Regulators at the D.C. Wasteland, but it's just a rumor. He's probably dead by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前，我听说他在废土首都触犯了法律被审判了，但这条消息也只是谣言。如果是真的话，他大概已经死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000051F2_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I resigned myself to this profession, and over time I've come to grips with the fact that chasing that man is a dead end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当初自我选择走上了这条路。经过这么长时间，我相信，追踪这个男人的旅途已经结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000051F2_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got quite a story out of me, didn't ya? I haven't talked about that in years. Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个很长的故事，不是吗？这些年我从来没有对任何人提起。好吧，还有什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Int_000051F2_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was his name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字叫什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: His name... was Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字叫...马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01How_000051F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's almost certainly dead by now. But if you ever come across him, shoot him for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他现在很有可能已经死了。但如果万一你碰到他了，请帮我把他的心挖出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01How_000051F5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any more questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01How_000051F5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, this next job is in Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，下个任务在诺瓦克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00005709_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over the past few weeks someone or something has snatched up several children from the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近这几周，在小镇周围，有什么人或什么东西绑架了几个小孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00005709_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The abductions always take place at night, and so far there's only one witness, and he's far from credible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绑架全都发生在夜里。至少到目前为止，只有一个目击证人，而且他有种让人无法信任的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00005709_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His name is Ricky. He's a Jet fiend who wanders around Novac doing odd jobs, but is generally regarded as a shiftless buffoon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字叫里基。他曾是个迷恋杰特的恶魔帮成员，经常鬼混在诺瓦克附近，干些莫名其妙的事。人们视他为一个呆头呆脑的小丑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00005709_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nonetheless, dumbass Ricky is the only lead we have right now. See if you can pry some information out of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，这个傻忽忽的里基是我们现在唯一的线索。你看看能不能从他那里得到什么更有价值的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00005709_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The citizens of Novac are just about panicked over this, so get out there and bag the creep responsible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诺瓦克的市民因为这件事发生恐慌情绪。赶快过去，调查一下到底是怎么回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00005709_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 75 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 75 player.additem aaFredBounty 1
No, I'm not ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我还没准备好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And why the hell not? Just leave, dammit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么还没有完事？抓紧时间，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000570A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are there any extra bounties I can pursue?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他的悬赏任务吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you have information about the child abductions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你知道有关那些小孩被绑架的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... it was dark...
ESP.TRADUIT: 额……那天晚上太暗了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I can't remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我……我记不起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059ED_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me what happened to those kids, or I'll snap your fucking spine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我究竟发生了什么，否则我把你撕成碎片！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, shit! Alright, man, ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，好，好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This guy had some kind of knife on his fingers... he just grabbed one and took them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个家伙手指上长着刀片……他抓小孩的动作很快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059F0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he went out the west of town... please, just leave me alone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他到小镇的西边去了……拜托了，请让我一个人静静！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059F0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 76
Just slow down and try to remember what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 静下来，慢慢地回想，到底发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... I, uh... There was this guy... And then... hey, do you have any Nuka Cola?
ESP.TRADUIT: 额……我，额……有一个家伙……然后……嘿，你有核子可乐么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lives are at stake! Focus!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些无辜的小孩子现在命悬一线，靠，看在上帝的份上，精神集中点！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was dark, and this guy went running out of town with one of the kids, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那天很黑，那个家伙带着一个小孩跑出镇去，额……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059F3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... thrown over... his, uh... what do you call it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 额……扛在……他的，额……你管他叫什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059F3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah, his shoulder. He was carrying the kid off to the west of town. I passed out after that. I think I'm gonna pass out again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对了，他的肩上。他扛着那个小孩直接朝小镇的西部跑去。我之后就昏倒了。我想我一会儿又要昏倒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ricky [02005017] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ric_000059F3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 76
I've heard enough of your preaching, zombie. I'm here for the bounty, and I aim to collect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经受够你的胡言乱语了，丧尸。我是为了赏金才来的，我一定要找到我的目标。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You smoothskins... so headstrong. Oh, children!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个滑皮……这么自负。哦，孩子们啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties01Fre_00006292_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaFredGhoulRef.enable aaFredGhoul2Ref.enable aaFredRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaFredGhoulRef.startcombat player aaFredGhoul2Ref.startcombat player aaFredRef.setav aggression 2
What happened to the other children?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的孩子怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: While they were obstinate at first, they came to see the light, and they'll be happy to make your acquaintance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚开始他们不听话，给他们点好吃的，他们很快就会很高兴地认识你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [0200DBB8] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties01Fre_00006291_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaFredGhoulRef.enable aaFredGhoul2Ref.enable aaFredRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaFredGhoulRef.startcombat player aaFredGhoul2Ref.startcombat player aaFredRef.setav aggression 2
I need information about the caravan attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要有关商队遇袭的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there was a big fucking explosion... and I got covered in Brahmin guts. Mike was shot to shit, but he managed to get one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，爆炸非常突然……我在牛肚子下面躲着。麦克被射成了一坨屎。不过临死前，他倒干掉一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chesty [02005222] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Che_00006ED4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't raiders, like I'm used to. It was a couple of old guys in weird uniforms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不是我遇见过的一般的强盗，那是一些穿着奇装异服的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chesty [02005222] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Che_00006ED4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was at this intersection, here <He points out the spot on your map>.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爆炸发生在这个十字路口，这儿<He points out the spot on your map>.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chesty [02005222] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Che_00006ED4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, there ain't much left there, but you can look. We cleaned up the bodies but left that old dude to rot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，那里应该不会剩下什么东西了，但你可以去看看。我们清理过一部分尸体，剩下的就管不着了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chesty [02005222] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Che_00006ED4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 16
Fuck you, freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈的，你个混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you've got some fight in you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你想打架是不是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Coy_00006EE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's how you want it, fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这就是你想要的，好极了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Coy_00006EE0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep killing your competition and it's going to catch up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再这么抢别人的生意，也不想想不会把别人逼急么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It hasn't so far... but I'm not getting any younger. I'll let you slide, for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少到现在还没有……但我已经不再年轻了。我允许你现在悄悄地走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Coy_00006EE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.CoyoteGreeted to 10 set aaBounties01.CoyoteBluffed to 1
I don't buy it. I think I'll just kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不打算买你的账，我打算杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Coy_00006EE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaCoyoteCollinsRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaCoyoteCollinsRef.setav aggression 3
I'm not a bounty hunter. I'm a traveling folk singer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不是赏金猎人呢，我就是个普通的孤独流浪汉！

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Convince him you're inept with firearms>
ESP.TRADUIT: <说服他，你根本就不会枪械>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, this will be easy. I'll just carve you up a little!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 好的，这就容易多了。我可以轻松地把你切成碎块！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Coy_00006EE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaCoyoteCollinsRef.setav health 100 aaCoyoteCollinsRef.removeitem aaCoyoteShotgun 1 aaCoyoteCollinsRef.equipitem WeapKnifeCombat aaCoyoteCollinsRef.setav aggression 3 aaCoyoteCollinsRef.ModDisposition Player -100
<Lie> I've never had much use for guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我从来没碰过那些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit. Every bounty hunter worth his salt knows how to use a piece. Just for lying, I'm going to kill you right now, asshole!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 胡扯。一个不会耍枪的赏金猎人？骗小孩？我现在就杀了你，混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Coy_00019EC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaCoyoteCollinsRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaCoyoteCollinsRef.setav aggression 3
Uh, I'm not very proficient with those things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，我对那些东西不是很熟练。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBounties01CoyoteIntelligence
Like I said before: Fuck. You.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我之前所说：操，你，妈！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, fuck you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，操你妈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Duane "The Coyote" Collins [02006ED6] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Coy_00006EE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaCoyoteCollinsRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaCoyoteCollinsRef.setav aggression 3
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding job. I hate zombies, particularly one that's a self-righteous child-killer. Here's a bonus for killing that freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。我恨僵尸，尤其是那种自恋天杀的孩童杀手。给，这是为你杀死那个怪胎的额外奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Fre_00007101_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 80 80 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 80 player.removeitem aaFredFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get out of here, you lazy fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么快滚去干活，你个懒蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Fre_00007102_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. This is another investigation, and our client is willing to cough up mucho dinero to see this thing resolved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。这有另一份工作。我们的客户急迫地希望这件事能快点解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00007106_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folks have been disappearing on the road south to the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近，在南面那条通往莫哈维前哨站的路上，有不少平民相继失踪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00007106_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the longest time people attributed it to the radscorpions, but our client is beginning to suspect human involvement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前人们一直都认为是辐射蝎造成的。但我们的客户现在开始怀疑，这是人为的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00007106_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The abductions are strange - there is little theft of property, and never any ransom notice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些绑架很奇怪，既没有什么财产可得，也不见任何赎金宣告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00007106_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Several of the missing wastelanders mentioned their search for a reputed oasis in the Mojave, which is pure horseshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个废土旅人在失踪前曾提到要寻找莫哈维的绿洲，这在我看来纯粹是扯淡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00007106_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In all likelihood, these are probably just natural casualties of the wasteland. Regardless, our client wants results. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从所有的可能性来看，这些人很有可能就只是普通的废土受难者。不管怎样，我们的客户需要答案。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00007106_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 85 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 85 player.additem aaMagoBounty 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get the hell outta here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么快滚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_00007107_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBounties01MotorheadForceGreet
You killed my brother, Motor-Runner, when you whored yourself out to those NCR cunts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了我的兄弟，机车手，你他妈把自己卖给了NCR是不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Motorhead [02003059] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to saw off your fucking face and use your guts to grease my chains!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你的脸锯成碎片，用你的内脏润滑我的锁链！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Motorhead [02003059] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MotorheadGreeted to 1 startcombat player
Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Dr. Vincent Mago, at your service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我介绍我自己。我是文森特.玛戈医生，愿意为您效劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007586_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to leave. Will you unlock the door, please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要走了。请问能不能帮我开一下门？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but I'm afraid I can't do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我恐怕我不能那么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007585_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My hospitality does require limits, thanks to the barbarous nature of the wasteland. I must detain you for several hours as a... precaution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于这片废土的野蛮天性，我的好客是有限度的。我必须把你扣留几小时……以作为预防措施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007585_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, relax and help yourself to a hot meal. If you're still determined to leave after dining, just convey your request over the intercom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请别介意，放松点，您可以随意享用这里的美食。如果你吃完了还是执意要走，那时请再通过对讲机告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007585_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 4
Why are you doing this? Isn't it reckless to invite strangers in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么做？如此轻易地让陌生人进来不是太大意了么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm doing this because I have suffered the unforgiving trials of the waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这么做是因为我已经遭遇过太多的不幸。我理解一个人在废土求生的困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007588_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have terrible, crippling hunger that pushes a man beyond reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也曾经遭遇不幸，体会到那残酷的饥饿能如何把人逼至极限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007588_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I discovered this shelter in one of my countless peregrinations, and in the course of time I've set out to create an oasis of philanthropy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在游历了数不尽的地方之后，我发现了这处避难地，然后花了很长时间在这里建立了我传播仁慈的绿洲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007588_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's very noble of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您真的很高尚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, stop it. You're too kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太客气了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_0000758A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, enjoy a hot meal. It's the least I can do. When you're ready to leave, just speak over the intercom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请享用这些美食吧。这就是我能尽的微薄之力。当你决定要走的时候，请通过对讲机告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_0000758A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 4
You're a gracious host, but I must be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您真是一位高尚的主人，但我现在必须要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been an exceedingly amicable guest, but I'm afraid I cannot meet your request. I have other plans, you see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您也是如此和善的一位客人，但我恐怕我不能满足您的要求。你看，我还有其他的安排。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_000075A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaMagoGasMessage playerref.removeallitems aaMagoPlayerGearRef
Imod FadeToBlackISFX PlayerRef.Moveto aaPlayerinJailMarker setstage aaBounties01 87 set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 5
Let me out of here, you fucking nutjob!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放我走，你个混蛋！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That type of churlish invective will get you nowhere, fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种粗野的交谈不会给你带来任何好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_000075A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaMagoGasMessage playerref.removeallitems aaMagoPlayerGearRef
Imod FadeToBlackISFX PlayerRef.Moveto aaPlayerinJailMarker setstage aaBounties01 87 set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 5
What the hell is going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里究竟发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in a cell in my bunker. I'm afraid this is the end of the line, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在被囚禁在我的地堡里。我恐怕你的日子就要走到头了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a matter of survival, really. What can I say? The wasteland really brings out that "War of all against all" quality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是生存的法则。我还能说什么呢？这片废土教会了我们，“战争与对抗是永恒的”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B64_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't know who you're fucking with. I'm going to cut your goddamn heart out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你根本就不知道你在和谁说话。我要把你的心挖出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lively, very lively!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还活着，你还活着！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get in some exercise, but please, don't strain yourself. It can alter the flavor of meat, making it... unsavory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，你可以原地活动活动。但请别让自己太劳累，因为这样肉会变得不鲜嫩……就没什么味道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B63_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now just behave yourself a few minutes. I'll return shortly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这几分钟表现好点。我一会儿后回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B63_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 10
You're a cannibal, aren't you? You've been luring people in and murdering them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然吃人？！原来是你，先把别人吸引到这里，然后又把他们杀掉！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you possess copacetic powers of observation. Yes, I'm a cannibal, and a long-lived one, thank you. I'm rather proud of that fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有很强的洞察力。是的，我是个食人者，而且已经活了很长时间。谢谢你指出，我对这个事实也感到很自豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't quite hear you. Lean in a little closer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听不太清你说什么。能否走近一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be deaf! I suppose there's little danger... you're still half-sedated, not to mention unarmed. <He leans in> Very well, I was saying...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是聋了！这不是对我会造成危险么……等等，你已经处于半昏迷状态，而且武装也都被我缴械了。[他倾斜过来] 好吧，我是说……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think I'll keep my distance, thank you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我认为还是要保持点距离，谢谢你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Assault Mago>
ESP.TRADUIT: <袭击玛戈>

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想干。。？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get your hands... off... can't feel...
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的手……拿开……我不能……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B6F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Fava beans... burning...
ESP.TRADUIT: 有火……在烧……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B6F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMagoRef.kill
set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 10 aaMagoJailDoorRef.unlock
<Break Mago's neck>
ESP.TRADUIT: [折断玛戈的脖子]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get your hands off of me, you damn, dirty ape!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的手拿开，你个混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00019EC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 10
<Attempt to Choke Mago>
ESP.TRADUIT: [试着掐玛戈]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fool. I'll be back shortly. Don't do anything stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 傻瓜。我马上就会回来。别做傻事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 10
No matter what happens, you'll get what's coming to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管将会发生，都你应得的。上帝会惩罚你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been capturing and eating preachy fools like you for decades. What makes you think you're any different?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在过去的这几十年，我抓获并烹食了数不尽的傻子。你凭什么认为你和他们不同呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a look at Bob over there. He was a spirited lawman from town, hell-bent on finding his brother's murderer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看那边那个家伙，他叫鲍勃。他本是个有朝气的警官，在看到他兄弟的死后，顿时就像烂泥一样瘫在地上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B6D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few nights ago Bob bashed his head in against the floor, in order to avoid the fate of his brother and so many others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几天之前，鲍勃每晚都拿头撞地板，为了避免自己走向和他的兄弟一样的命运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B6D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's the justice in that? By every indication Bob was an honest, brave soul, who died with pride. Yet, I'm still standing here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这时候正义又在哪呢？从各方面来看，鲍勃是有个诚实的，勇敢的灵魂的人，他带着骄傲死去。然而，我还好好的依旧站在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B6D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't talk to me about justice. In a few minutes you're going to be silent, meaningless fodder for my survival. There's your justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别跟我谈论什么狗屁正义。再过几分钟，你就会永远沉默下去，成为我生存下去的下脚料。那，才是你的正义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007B6D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.MagoGreeted to 10
There's no chance I can talk you out of this, is there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有机会再跟你讨论了，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid not. Don't worry - I'll be quick about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恐怕是的。这是个涉及生存的问题。别担心，我会让你痛快点的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007BAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMagoJailDoorRef.unlock startcombat player aaMagoRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaMagoRef.setav aggression 2
Go fuck yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMagoJailDoorRef.unlock startcombat player aaMagoRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaMagoRef.setav aggression 2
Step into this cell and see what happens. I'll shove that cleaver up your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进到那间房间去，让我们看看接下来会发生什么。我要从你的屁股开始切起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to enjoy this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会好好享受的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0200757D] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld02\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_00007BAC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMagoJailDoorRef.unlock startcombat player aaMagoRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaMagoRef.setav aggression 2
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding job. Come back when you're ready for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮！等你准备好接下一单工作就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Cul_0000A841_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 40 40 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 40 player.removeitem aaCullenFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get out there and smoke that bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就滚出去赶紧开工！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Cul_0000A842_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to see Mr. Idaho. It's extremely urgent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来见爱达荷先生。有急事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, well, if you say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，好吧，如果你这么说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rowdy Dalton [0200AD3F] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Row_0000AD4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, no way, jackass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔喔，没门，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rowdy Dalton [0200AD3F] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_SpeechChallenge_0000AD4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me through or I'll crack your fucking skull open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我过去，否则我爆开你的脑袋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, normally I wouldn't let you through, but, uh, since it's important, you can go through, I guess... just this once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，一般情况下我不会让你过去，不过，尽然那么重要，你可以过去了……就这一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rowdy Dalton [0200AD3F] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Row_0000AD4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to kill Tony Idaho.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这，是为了杀托尼.爱达荷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You what? You won't leave here alive, bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么？你别想活着出去，混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rowdy Dalton [0200AD3F] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Row_0000AD4D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.TonyAlerted to 1 startcombat player aaTonyIdahoRef.startcombat player aaTonyIdahoRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaRowdyDaltonRef.startcombat player aaRowdyDaltonRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaRowdyDaltonRef.setav aggression 2 aaTonyIdahoRef.setav aggression 2
There's a bounty on your head. I'm here to collect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来取你的人头了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll bury you, cockroach!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要亲手埋了你，蟑螂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Idaho [0200A843] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaTonyIdahoBoun_0000AD51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaTonyIdahoRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaRowdyDaltonRef.startcombat player aaRowdyDaltonRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaRowdyDaltonRef.setav aggression 3 aaTonyIdahoRef.setav aggression 3
I'm always ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我随时都没问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, this next bounty has a fine payoff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，下一个悬赏目标的报酬相当好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000AD58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The target is Tony Idaho, a young man who's shaking up the drug trade in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目标叫托尼.爱达荷，这个家伙现在搅乱了整个莫哈维的毒品贸易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000AD58_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's been able to put more dope on the market at cheaper rates than all his competitors, including the Khans, who are not too pleased.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的产品在市场上的售价遥远低于他的竞争对手，其中包括大汗棒。大汗们现在很不高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000AD58_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're getting quite a reputation - the client asked for you by name. They want Tony to bite the dust, immediately. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在的名声已经相当大了——所以顾客指定由你来办。他们希望托尼永远沉睡在沙子里，越快越好。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000AD58_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 45 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 45 player.additem aaTonyIdahoBounty 1
I'm not ready just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没准备好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back when you have your shit together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的破事准备好了就快回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000AD57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding work. Take a break, kid. You've earned it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮。休息一下，小子。这是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ton_0000AD5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 50 50 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 50 player.removeitem aaTonyIdahoFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500
Not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get out there and do the job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那还呆在这干什么，快去干活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ton_0000AD5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A kidnapping cannibal, you say? Shit, that's a surprise. Most of the cannibals around here have been put out of business by the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个专门绑架的食人魔？操，还有这种事。按理说大部分这样的家伙早就被NCR赶出这一带了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_0000B64E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, here's your reward. Excellent work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，给，这是你应得的报酬。干得好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_0000B64E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 90 90 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 90 player.removeitem aaMagoFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get the hell out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么快滚出去干活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Mag_0000B64F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a filthy liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个下流的骗子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prove it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 证明给我看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0200B653] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jac_0000B65C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJackRef.startcombat player aaJackRef.setav aggression 1 aaJackRef.evp
Fuck you, shitkicker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你丫的，土包子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your move, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就快走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0200B653] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jac_0000B65D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJackRef.startcombat player aaJackRef.setav aggression 1 aaJackRef.evp
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. This next contract has some significant risks, but a hefty payday to match it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。不过下一个合同就有点风险了，当然赏金也是很丰盛的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B665_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your target is a gunslinger known simply as "Jack". Our client hasn't given us much to work with, but it doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的目标是一个持枪歹徒，据称他叫“杰克”。我们的客户没有给我们其他什么信息，不过只要前面那点就足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B665_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jack used to be the chief gunman for Heck Gunderson, and managed the muscle in Gunderson's operations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克以前是哈克.冈德森的首席职业枪手，负责管理公司的“执行”部门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B665_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I said he managed the muscle, I mean he pretty much was the muscle. Jack intimidated countless landowners into selling their property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说他参与管理，其实他正是执行者。杰克恐吓了大量的土地所有者，并逼迫他们低价出售自己的土地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B665_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Along the way, Jack managed to rack up a significant body count. Over the years he became more and more ruthless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一路走下来，在杰克身后躺下的尸体越来越多。慢慢的，他变得越来越残忍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B665_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recently Jack shot up a farmer and his wife, so Mr. Gunderson quickly cut all ties with his pistolero. Now, Jack is just another gun for hire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近，杰克枪杀了一对农场主夫妇。冈德森先生迅速解雇了他，和他撇清了一切关系。现在，杰克就只是个无所事事的老枪手了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B665_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without Gunderson to protect him, though, Jack is fair game. He's made plenty of enemies, and they all want to see him dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有冈德森先生保护他，杰克就好对付多了。他树立了太多的敌人，每一个都希望他死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B665_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I head he had drifted into Goodsprings, hoping to get work with the locals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所听到最后的消息是，他流落到了清泉镇，希望从当地人那里找到一份工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B665_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jack is as fast as they come, so be ready, kid. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克是个很出色的快枪手。所以好好准备吧，祝你好运，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B665_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 95 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 95 player.additem aaJackBounty 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then quit wasting my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别再浪费我的时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000B664_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a little surprised to see you unscathed. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很惊讶你竟然毫发未损。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jac_0000BC38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 100 100 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 100 player.removeitem aaJackFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get out there and do your damn job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么快滚出去，把你的任务搞定再回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jac_0000CDC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, here's the story. The Westside Milita has lost some personnel to a marauding fiend ringleader named Kurt Katil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，故事是这样的。西区军队因为一个叫科特.卡迪尔的恶魔帮成员损失了不少士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000BC3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He and his crew have been ambushing patrols and periodically taking captives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和他的部下经常埋伏巡逻队，并时不时地绑架俘虏士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000BC3C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reports indicate his favorite torture is gnawing on the intestines of living captives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 报告指出，他最喜爱的折磨方式，是活生生地撕咬俘虏的肠子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000BC3C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Needless to say, he's a sick fuck. Bag this asshole and head back, ok? Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，他是个变态。把他干掉，好吧？祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000BC3C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 105 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 105 player.additem aaKurtBounty 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't come back until you're ready to work, dammit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你准备好了再回来，好吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000BC3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, your target is Tommy, a hotheaded wiseguy associated with the Omertas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，你的目标叫汤米，是黑手党的一名成员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000C73E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tommy was always quick to throw down, but the other night he got worked up after some guy cracked a joke about his shoes. Can you imagine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤米之前不太惹事。但某天晚上他听到有人嘲笑他的鞋子，于是他一转身就把敲晕了。你能想的出来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000C73E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, Tommy whipped out his pistol and capped this fella, right there outside the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总而言之，汤米抽出了他的手枪，在他身上装上了雷管，就在赌场边上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000C73E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As it turns out, this guy was sort of... connected, so to speak. In short, Tommy fucked up, and now he's gotta pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果，那个家伙从某种程度上来说……肢体还算能连起来。总之汤米要为此付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000C73E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My contact says that Tommy is probably hiding out at the old Tumbleweed Ranch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的消息说，汤米正在躲在老风滚草农场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000C73E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say he's jumpy as shit and prone to shoot anything that comes through the door, so be careful. Good luck, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说他现在很神经质，会攻击一切靠近门的东西。小心点，孩子，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000C73E_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 55 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 55 player.additem aaTommyBounty 1
I'm not ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The contract is waiting, kid. Don't take too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的客户在等着呢，孩子，别花太长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000C73F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terrific work, kid. Here's a bonus. Come back when you're ready for more work.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Tom_0000C744_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 60 60 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 60 player.removeitem aaTommyFinger 1 player.additem caps001 750
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop standing around this dump and go bag that goon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别在这傻站着，快去干活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Tom_0000C743_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're beginning to bore the hell out of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩火必为火焚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'll let my sword do the talking, worm!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就让我的剑来告诉你，什么是怒火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucius Pullo [0200C745] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Luc_0000C769_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaLuciusPulloRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaLuciusPulloRef.setav aggression 2
Who the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm First Spear Centurion Lucius Pullo, friend to the late Vulpes Inculta.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吾乃凯撒军团第一长矛团百夫长，卢修斯.普罗，late Vulpes Inculta之友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucius Pullo [0200C745] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Luc_0000C767_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You slew my friend without cause, and I am here for justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无缘无故杀了我的朋友，我是来这主持正义的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucius Pullo [0200C745] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Luc_0000C767_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stipendium peccati mors est. <Attack>
Mors tua, vita mea.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucius Pullo [0200C745] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Luc_0000C768_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaLuciusPulloRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaLuciusPulloRef.setav aggression 2 aaLuciusPulloRef.setav health 200
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someway, somehow, a collection of bums, junkies and lowlifes managed to scrape together 500 caps for this next bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，不知怎的，拾荒者，吸毒者和下层民众设法凑了500瓶盖作为下个任务对象的赏金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CA52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bounty is on some rich kid named Alex. From time to time little Alex enjoys terrorizing the less fortunate members of Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个悬赏的对象是一个叫艾利克斯的有钱小鬼。这家伙对恐吓自由之城的贫民乐在其中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CA52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This seems like a waste of time, but business is business, and they've already shelled out the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来似乎浪费时间，但生意就是生意，客户已经把钱都寄过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CA52_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their head honcho is some bum named Jasper. You can find him at Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 客户的头叫杰斯帕，一个无所事事的家伙。你可以在自由之城找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CA52_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 65 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 65
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Take your sweet-ass time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。那去把你的屁股擦干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CA53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not picky about where the caps come from. Consider it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从不挑剔这些瓶盖从哪里来。我接受了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever the professional, eh? Just bring back the finger, same as usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 越来越职业了么，嗯？像以前一样，把手指带回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CA56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaAlexBounty 1
They're probably desperate. Give them back the caps - I'll do it for free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里的人生活在水深火热之中。把这些瓶盖还给客户，我不要一分钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, it's your money. Just don't go soft on me, kid. It's bad for your health in this profession. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，这是你的钱，别跟我说这些恶心人的话，孩子。干这行你自己的身体最重要。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CA57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RewardKarma 25 player.additem aaAlexBounty 1
What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了什么事情？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alex and his boys... they heard me and Ben got the money together... and so they kicked the shit out of me and dragged him into the alley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾利克斯和他那帮人……他们听说我和本一起拿着那笔赏金……就偷袭我们。我被撂倒了，本被拖到那个小巷子里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0200CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld01\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jas_0000CA5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ben never hurt nobody... but I reckon they killed him. That's what they do sometimes, just for a laugh, those sonsabitches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本从没伤害过任何人……但我担心他们会把他杀了。他们有时的确会这么干的，而仅仅是为了乐趣，这帮混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0200CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld01\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jas_0000CA5A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to give them exactly what they've been dishing out. I'll cut Alex's head off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要让他们尝尝他们自己种下的恶果。看我怎么砍掉艾利克斯的头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, you're not fucking around, are you? I was kinda doubtful, but you're going to kill those assholes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 靠，你不是这一带的人吧你？我很怀疑你的话，但你真的要去干掉那帮家伙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0200CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld01\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jas_0000CA5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you're here, but either way I'm not sticking around. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你能来这，但我不能在这继续呆下去了。祝你好运吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0200CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld01\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jas_0000CA5D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 66
Calm Down, I'm going to find your friend and deal with Alex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点，我一定帮你找到你的朋友，我来处理艾利克斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sure hope so, otherwise I'm a dead man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然也这样希望，否则我早就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0200CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld01\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jas_0000CA5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一定要离开这个鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0200CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleOld01\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jas_0000CA5E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 66
You brought sticks to a gunfight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就带根棍子想来跟我打？不自量力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gunfights be damned! Come and get one in the yarbles, if you have any yarbles!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操！如果你有种就来陪我们玩玩，如果你有种的话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0200CA5F] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ale_0000CA74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaDimRef.startcombat player aaGeorgieRef.startcombat player aaPeteRef.startcombat player aaAlexRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaAlexRef.setav aggression 2
Eat shit and die, you sick fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃屎，去死，你个混球玩意

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naughty, naughty, naughty!
ESP.TRADUIT: 粗鲁，粗鲁，太粗鲁了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0200CA5F] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ale_0000CA75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaDimRef.startcombat player aaGeorgieRef.startcombat player aaPeteRef.startcombat player aaAlexRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaAlexRef.setav aggression 2
So you capture helpless bums and eat them? What the fuck is wrong with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你把那个无助的家伙抓了，然后吃了？你他妈的哪里有病吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could never stand to see a filthy, dirty old drunkie, howling away at the filthy songs of his fathers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没法忍受这样一个恶心的、肮脏的、老酒鬼，一路嚎叫着唱歌歌颂着他的死老头子们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0200CA5F] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ale_0000CA73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work. You're bringing us a lot of business, so here's a bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错。你给我们带来了大量的生意。这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Kur_0000CDC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 110 110 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 110 player.removeitem aaKurtFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1250
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what the fuck are you waiting for? Go kill him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那你还站在这干什么？去干掉他啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Kur_0000CDC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, here's the story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我来给你讲讲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CDDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chuck Bowdrie, a senior NCR Ranger, recently defected to Caesar's legion. Before jumping ship, he killed two fellow rangers while on patrol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恰克.博迪莱，前NCR高级游骑兵，近期背叛并加入凯撒军团。在彻底下水前，他枪杀了两名巡逻中的游骑兵兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CDDA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our client wants this guy terminated with extreme prejudice. We don't have many leads, but he's said to be on the run up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的客户希望他被处以极刑。我们没有太多的线索，不过据说他正往北方逃窜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CDDA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I happen to know that several rangers in Bowdrie's old troop used to crash at Field's shack, close to Nellis. You might try there. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我碰巧听说，几个来自博迪莱老部队的游骑兵经常在一处田间小屋夜宿，那个地方靠近内里斯空军基地。你或许可以从那儿入手。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CDDA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 115 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 115 player.additem aaChuckBounty 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then why are you wasting my time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你浪费我的时间干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000CDD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, here's a reward, whether you want it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是报酬，不管你想不想要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ale_0000D033_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting some very interesting contracts. Come back when you're ready to pursue them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在又得到了几份很有趣的合同。想继续的话随时欢迎到我这儿来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ale_0000D033_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 70 70 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 70 player.removeitem aaAlexFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get your ass to Freeside and kills that fucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你赶紧去自由之城干掉那个王八蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ale_0000D034_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I must admit - I harbor an acute loathing for traitors of any sort, so here's a bonus on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我必须承认-我对任何形式的背叛者发自内心地蔑视。给，这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Chu_0000E7BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 120 120 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 120 player.removeitem aaChuckFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1250
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get your ass out there and smoke that perfidious piece of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你还在这干什么？赶紧滚出去干活！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Chu_0000E7C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, the target is Billy Bogan, a recently escaped convict from the NCR Correctional Facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这次的目标是比利.博根，一个最近刚从NCR监狱里跑掉的罪犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000E7C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was on death row for the murder of an NCR ranger, Captain Gunn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他要为一起谋杀负责，谋杀的受害者是一名NCR游骑兵，上尉 甘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000E7C4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Young Billy was headed for the gallows, but now he's running free, much to the chagrin of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 年轻的比利本要接受绞刑，但他现在跑了，NCR为此懊恼不已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000E7C4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing as to how they're stretched thin, the NCR's relying on you to see that Billy doesn't escape justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于这群家伙笨的连点线索都找不到，NCR现在指望你来实现对比利的惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000E7C4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our informant said that Billy's formed a new gang composed of ex-cons, raiders and various misfits, and apparently they're armed to the teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我们的情报，比利现在组织了一个由有犯罪前科的人、土匪、强奸犯和其他杂七杂八的人等构成的团伙。显然，他们武装到了牙齿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000E7C4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Billy and his gang are headed north, likely to raid in lawless regions. I'm betting they're camped outside the northern passage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比利和他的帮派之后向北进发，可能在一些法律触及不到的地区大肆抢劫。我打赌，他们现在应该在北方的某个地方驻扎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000E7C4_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get up there and bag that punk. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找到他然后把他收拾了。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000E7C4_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 125 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 125 player.additem aaBillyBounty 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then leave, dammit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就去干活，可恶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kicking ass out there, kid. At this rate I'm going to be out of contracts soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太厉害了，孩子。你再这么快，我这边就快没合同了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bil_0000EAF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't worry, there's plenty of work left. Come back when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，别担心，我开玩笑，还有很多工作等着你去做，等你准备好了就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bil_0000EAF1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 130 130 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 130 player.removeitem aaBillyFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1250
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm running out of patience. Go kill that murdering bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我快没耐心了。快去把那个混蛋干掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bil_0000EAF2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've done a great job here, Sheriff, but your services are needed elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的工作干得很棒，警长。但我恐怕别的地方更需要你的服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, thank you. You know, I have made quite a difference here. There's plenty of other towns that need regulating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么，谢谢你，你知道，我给这里已经带来了巨大的变化。当然，外面还有很多小镇需要督管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Dal_0000EB03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.DallasGreeted to 10 setstage aaBounties01 140 aaDallasRef.evp
That's not going to work on me, runt. Regulators don't respond to threats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种话对我没用，矮子。监管者不会害怕威胁的。
