ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_SpeechChallenge_0000EAFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.DallasGreeted to 2
I'm here on behalf of Westside's citizens. Leave right now or I'll break your fucking neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表西区的市民站在这里。现在就给我滚，否则让你吃不了兜着走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩，额……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Dal_0000EB02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck em! If they want to live like fucking barbarians, without law and order, to hell with them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的！如果他们想像野蛮人一样地生活而无视法律和秩序的存在的话，那么就下地狱吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Dal_0000EB02_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.DallasGreeted to 10 setstage aaBounties01 140
You couldn't break open a can of cat food, dickshit. Get out of my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你连一罐猫食都打不开，蠢货。别再出现在我的视野里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Dal_0001AFF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.DallasGreeted to 2
Get out of here, or I'll break... your collarbone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我滚出这里，不然我就。。。折断你的脊椎！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to leave town, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在就给我从这儿滚蛋，现在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kiss my ass. I'm not going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲我的屁股吧。我哪也不去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Dal_0000EB01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.DallasGreeted to 2
You're going to leave Westside right now, in a coffin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你马上给我从西区滚蛋，否则我就帮你买口棺材。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞他妈什么鬼？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0200EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Dal_0000EB04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaDallasRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaDallasRef.setav aggression 2
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Before we delve into the bounty, I'm going to give you a quick history lesson. Stop rolling your eyes, dammit - this relates to the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。在我们进入下一个赏金猎物之前，我先给你上堂历史课。别皱眉头，臭小子——这和你接下来的任务有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll assume you're unfamiliar with the Regulators. In the eastern U.S., Regulators are idealistic vigilantes, hell-bent on killing bad guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你对“监管者”不是很熟悉。在美国东部，“监管者”类似传统意义的警察，拼命追杀坏蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB09_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, in the Core Region Regulators are a very different breed. They're basically thugs who force businesses to pay protection money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在中部地区，“监管者”却是完全不同的一类人。他们强迫商人支付保护费，跟强盗没什么两样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB09_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're authoritarian gangsters, really. This relates to your bounty because the target is a western Regulator by the name of Dallas Courtright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们其实就是手里握有权利的土匪。这之所以和你的任务有关，就是这次你的目标是他们其中之一，一个叫达拉斯.考特莱特的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB09_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recently Dallas drifted into Westside and appointed himself Sheriff and de facto dictator. He's taxing commerce and breaking heads left and right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近，这个达拉斯来到西区，自称为警长和独裁者。他对商业人们收税，而且为所欲为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB09_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In light of this, a collection of concerned citizens has contracted us to "convince" Sheriff Courtright to leave, by any means necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对此，一些深感忧虑的市民们一起向我提供这样一份合同，希望能把他赶跑，越快越好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB09_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is an unusual contract in that you don't have to kill or capture the target. Just convince him that leaving is in his best interests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一份不同寻常的合同，因为你不必把他杀掉或逮捕，你只需说服他“离开这里符合他的利益”就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB09_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's a stubborn ass and you have to let the lead do the talking, so be it. Just get him out of Westside. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他还是顽固不化，那么你想干什么就干什么吧。记住，只要让他离开西区就好。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB09_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties01 135 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 135 player.additem aaDallasBounty 1
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then why are you here? What do you think we're in, the fuckin' haberdashery business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你还打算继续在这站着？你以为我们是干什么的？好吃懒做就能赚钱了？？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Bou_0000EB07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, hillbilly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈，混蛋乡巴佬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eat shit and die, murderer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吃屎吧你，杀人犯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties_aaBounties01McC_0000EB1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaDanMcCafferyRef.startcombat player aaJesseMcCafferyRef.startcombat player aaLukeMcCafferyRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaDanMcCafferyRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJesseMcCafferyRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaLukeMcCafferyRef.setav aggression 2 aaDanMcCafferyRef.setav aggression 2 aaJesseMcCafferyRef.setav aggression 2
Yes, I killed Caleb, but it was strictly business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我杀了凯勒，但这只不过是生意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then you're gonna enjoy the business end of my barrel!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，看来你是想自讨苦吃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties_aaBounties01McC_0000EB1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaDanMcCafferyRef.startcombat player aaJesseMcCafferyRef.startcombat player aaLukeMcCafferyRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaDanMcCafferyRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJesseMcCafferyRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaLukeMcCafferyRef.setav aggression 2 aaDanMcCafferyRef.setav aggression 2 aaJesseMcCafferyRef.setav aggression 2
<Lie> I had nothing to do with your brother's death.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我和你兄弟的死毫无关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... If you say so. I guess we made a mistake. We'll be on our way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩……如果真是这样，那我误会你了。我们还是各走各的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties_aaBounties01McC_0000EB1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.LukeGreeted to 10
I've heard enough of your bullshit. It's payback time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听够了你的胡扯。现在该偿血债了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0200EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult07\aaBounties_aaBounties01McC_0000EB19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaDanMcCafferyRef.startcombat player aaJesseMcCafferyRef.startcombat player aaLukeMcCafferyRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaDanMcCafferyRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJesseMcCafferyRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaLukeMcCafferyRef.setav aggression 2 aaDanMcCafferyRef.setav aggression 2 aaJesseMcCafferyRef.setav aggression 2
Why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to give you an offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这给你个提议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Sug_0000EB30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go fuck yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaJavierSugarRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJavierSugarRef.setav aggression 2
What do I stand to gain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You stand to gain everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么都能得到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Sug_0000EB31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who do you work for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为谁工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should have taken the offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚才要是接受就好了。现在你已经毫无退路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you going to beg?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还想祈求吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Sug_0000EB36_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBounties01SugarCrazy
I'm not interested in the offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你的提议毫无兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what has to happen, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你自己清楚接下来会发什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Sug_0000EB35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不需要这样做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: People always say the same thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们总是说相同的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Sug_0000EB3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say, "You don't have to do this."
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说：“你没必要这么做。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Sug_0000EB3A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should admit your situation. There will be more dignity in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该明白你当前的形势。你自己想想怎么做才能更有尊严。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Sug_0000EB3A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是条活路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Sug_0000EB3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dyin' ain't much of a living, boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等死可不是我的作风，伙计。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaJavierSugarRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJavierSugarRef.setav aggression 2
What happened to Randall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I buried him in the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他已经被我埋在沙漠里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0200EB28] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Sug_0000F3D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough discussion. I'm here to kill you, fat man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 讨论到此为止。我来是杀你的，死胖子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not original, but succinct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不新颖，但简洁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaJudgeGuard1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard2Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard3Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard4Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.startcombat player aatheJudgeRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaTheJudgeRef.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.setav aggression 2 set aaBounties01.JudgeGreeted to 10
Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Titles are ultimately a trivial matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫什么并不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I can do, however, is more important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重要的是，我能做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D81_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you kill Randall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要杀兰道尔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's only natural to eliminate the competition, and that takes on a literal quality in these times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉一个竞争对手，再自然不过了吧，这有什么好奇怪的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Historical law always subverts moral law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 历史规律总是在颠覆道德律。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D82_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what can you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你能干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I represent an organization of like-minded individuals. We're beginning to assert ourselves across the carcass of North America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个由一伙志同道合的个体组成的组织的代表。我们要开始在整个北美的废墟上发展我们的组织。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In time... we'll be in a position to establish control on a regional level.
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼下。。。。我们将要彻底夺取这一地区的控制权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've proven yourself capable, and despite your obdurate nature, I'm willing to extend an offer to join the organization. This is your only chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经证明了你的能力。尽管你有些顽固不化，但我还是向你提出加入我们组织的邀请。这是你最后的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D85_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're nothing more than a low murderer. I want no part of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，除了一个卑劣的刽子手，狗屁都不是。我才不和你同流合污。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a shame. Such a waste...
ESP.TRADUIT: 太遗憾了。这么好的才能就这样浪费了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaJudgeGuard1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard2Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard3Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard4Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.startcombat player aatheJudgeRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaTheJudgeRef.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.setav aggression 2 set aaBounties01.JudgeGreeted to 10
What is it, some kind of post-apocalyptic illuminati? Who's in your little club?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么东西，某种后启示录光照派？都是些什么人聚集在你这个小俱乐部？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Names you've never heard, from places you've never visited. Littlehorn, for example.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是些你从没听说过的名字，都是些你从没去过的地方来的人。比如，小号角。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although I think there is someone you've heard of - Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想，应该还是有一个名字你应该听说过---马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D89_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The less you know, the better.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D8B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, your relentless inquiries have taxed my patience. It's time for a decision
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，你的问东问西是在考验我的耐心。是时候做出决定了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D8B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我他是谁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's just a man - the most human sort, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就是个人，一个真男人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe he's a balancing force. Man is predatory by nature, and Marko exemplifies those qualities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信他就是一种自然的平衡力量的体现。男人生来就要掠夺成性，马尔科拥有所有这样的特质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D8C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko represents homo sapiens in its purest form.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科是最纯正智人的代表。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D8C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is on an endless journey, sowing strife at every opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他正在他那无尽的旅途中，抓住每一个机会散播罪恶与争斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D8E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that said, I heard rumors he was marauding through the Llano Estacado, but it's only speculation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说我一些小道传闻，说他正在穿越埃斯特卡多大草原，但没有人亲眼见到过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D8E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko is just one man. I'm sensing that you're apathetic about my offer. Understand there is no turning back now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科只是一个男人。我能觉察到，你对我的提议毫无兴趣。你要明白，你现在已经没有后悔药了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D8E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sending you to hell, right now. Then I'm going to send Marko to keep you company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来送你下地狱的。之后，我会送马尔科来陪你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still ruled by fear, aren't you? Fool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在害怕得开始胡言乱语了吧？傻子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00011D90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaJudgeGuard1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard2Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard3Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard4Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.startcombat player aatheJudgeRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaTheJudgeRef.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.setav aggression 2 set aaBounties01.JudgeGreeted to 10
What's in it for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我有什么好处？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides walking out of this bunker alive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了活着走出这个地堡？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019327_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you enter our ranks, I can guarantee a signing bonus to the tune of.... 50,000 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你加入，我向你保证你从我这可以赚到……50000个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019327_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what's your decision?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么样？告诉我你的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019327_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll join the organization. What do I have to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意加入。我需要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, I'd like to commend you for making the sapient choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我要称赞你做了如此聪明的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_0001932A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll seal this deal the old-fashioned way - with a handshake. Just come around the desk and greet me when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其次，我们以一种传统的方式——握手——来缔结我们的契约。等你准备好了，就到台前来跟我握手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_0001932A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.JudgeHired to 1
<Shake the Judge's hand>
ESP.TRADUIT: [和审判官握手]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I think you'll find the arrangement... agreeable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我想你会很快发现这样的安排……是令人非常惬意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019331_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaJudgePoisonMessage aaJudgeBunkerDoorRef.lock 255 playerref.moveto aaJoinJudgeTravelMarkerREF setstage aaBounties01 160
<Lie> I can't quite hear you Judge, can you lean in closer?
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我听不太清楚，审判官，你能近点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you suddenly gone deaf? Alright, now what's your decision?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你突然聋了吗？好吧，你的决定是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019333_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you're quite close enough. Are you going to commit or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你离已经够近了。你到底是加还是不加入？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_SpeechChallenge_00019332_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie>No, I swear I can't hear you. Please lean in closer.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 不，我发誓我听不到你。请再近点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A young person like you shouldn't be hard of hearing! Alright, I know you can hear me now - what is your decision?
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这个年龄的年轻人怎么会听不到声音？好吧，现在应该可以听见了吧--你的决定是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019334_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you're quite close enough. Are you going to commit or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你离得已经够近了。你到底要不要入伙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00021751_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Rip out the Judge's throat with your bare teeth>
ESP.TRADUIT: [用裸露的牙齿撕咬审判官的喉咙]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get away from me, you maniac! My neck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我远点，你个疯子！我的脖子……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019337_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTheJudgeRef.kill
<Use a strength-based attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: <尽全力一击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You bastard! Slaves... fucking useless...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个混蛋！我的奴隶呢……真他妈没用……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019336_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko... brother... find...
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科...兄弟...找...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTheJudgeRef.kill
<Break the Judge's neck>
ESP.TRADUIT: [扭断审判官的脖子]

ESP.ORIGINAL: <He easily escapes your grasp> Get your hands off me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的手拿开！[他躲开你的攻击]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019EC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll pay for this treachery!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要为你的背叛付出代价！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019EC8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaJudgeGuard1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard2Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard3Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard4Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.startcombat player aatheJudgeRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaTheJudgeRef.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.setav aggression 2 set aaBounties01.JudgeGreeted to 10
<Choke the Judge>
ESP.TRADUIT: [掐死审判官]

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBounties01
Do you know anything about somebody called "The Judge"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知不知道一个叫“审判官”的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, I know about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我认识他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a fucking butcher and a pederass. Some people don't believe he exists, but he's quite real.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就是个屠夫，是个恋童癖。有些人不相信有这么个家伙，但他的确是存在的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's close to seven feet tall and stronger than any man alive. I saw him rip a man's jawbone out and bludgeon him to death with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他大概7英尺高，比一般人要强壮。我曾见他敲烂一个人的下颚，并一直殴打到死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like to admit it, but I worked with him on one job - it was the worst mistake I made in the course of my career.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想承认，但我以前和他一起工作过——这或许是我一生中犯下的最大的错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm no stranger to killin', but that maniac actually enjoyed it. We were supposed to acquire a man who had fled the NCR, but things went wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不够强壮，所以杀人这活我干起来很勉强，但他完全是乐在其中。有一次，我们本应该捉住一个NCR逃兵，但后来出了事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was watching the door when the Judge went inside to haul the target out, since we were supposed to get him alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在外面放哨，由审判官进去放倒目标。我们本来应该是把他活着抓住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon after I hear the shotgun go off and a kid screaming bloody murder, so I run inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久我听到枪声，一个小孩子开始哭喊“凶手”，于是我冲了进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was blood everywhere... he had shot the man and then scalped him before I could blink. He was just standing there, grinning...
ESP.TRADUIT: 到处都是血……他把那个男人崩了，在我还没来得及眨眼之前，把他的头皮也割了下来。他就站在那里，龇牙咧嘴地笑着……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He turned and grabbed the target's child, a little red-headed boy. That's when I shot him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他转过身，抓起那个正哭喊的孩子，那是一个红头发的小男孩。也就在这时，我对他开枪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shouldn't say anymore. Are you ready to work or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不该说这么多的。你准备好开始干活了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933A_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's bad mojo, kid. You don't want any part of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个坏兆头，孩子。你肯定不想参合进来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_SpeechChallenge_00019339_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't leave me hanging! What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你别吊我胃口了！然后发生什么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I regret that I only wounded him. He never forgot, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很后悔我当时只是伤了他。他也永远也不会忘记那一刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I saw him standing over that boy, knife in hand... I saw what I might have become... a fucking monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我看到他站在那里抓着孩子，另一只手里的刀慢慢提起……我觉得，我的面前仿佛站着一个……怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At that point I decided to start my own firm, even if it meant risking my neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那之后，我决定开办属于自己的公司，即使这意味着我要开始冒自己人头的风险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Judge had his own plans, of course. He started up Richter & Associates, where he's the primary shot-caller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个审判官有他自己的计划。他在里克特同伙会的地位日渐攀升，现在好像已经成为地区总管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From what I hear, he might be moving to Vegas. If that's true, things are likely to get a lot bloodier here in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我的情报表明，他要来维加斯了。如果那是真的，那么莫哈维很有可能要掀起一场腥风血雨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dammit, you got me distracted! Are you ready to work or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可恶，你从我这儿套出太多的故事了！你准备好开始干活了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933C_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned you were from Mississippi, right? What's it like there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到过你来自密西西比，是吗？那是个什么样的地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hot and humid as fuck, and the mosquitoes will literally eat your ass alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里又热又潮湿，成群的蚊子喜欢优雅地叮你屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up on a farm, herding Brahmin and other livestock. Some of the places are still irradiated, but it's mostly cleared up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在一个农场长大，平时主要养牛，有时也干点别的农活。农场里有些地方依旧充满了辐射，但整体环境并不杂乱无章。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gulf's a rough region, but people get by. It would take an act of God to tame that place - I doubt even Caesar and his crazies could manage it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加利福尼亚是一块贫瘠的土地，但还是会有很多人从那里路过。我在那里像上帝一样开垦那片土地——我甚至怀疑凯撒和他的疯狂追随者们都不能像我做的这样好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties
Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, quit distracting me! Are you ready to work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，别再套我话了！。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties
Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_0001933E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do I have to collect fingers? Can't I bring back their head or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么非要我收集手指？头或者其他什么部位的可不可以？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you, some kind of psychopath?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大脑短路了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019340_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we collect fingers because it's a quick and efficient way to provide proof of death. I'm not building some crazy finger necklace or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，收集手指是因为这是最快速甚至最有效的证明死亡的方法。我才不想要用这些手指穿个项链什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019340_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned it from a man I encountered in my younger days. He found me after Marko had cut me to shreds, since he was on that bastard's trail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我从我年轻的时候碰到的一个人那里学到的。他在马尔科走后发现了我，因为他也一直在追踪马克的痕迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019340_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His name was Marshal Cooper, and he was the bravest lawman and bounty hunter I ever encountered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字叫马歇尔.库珀，他是我见过的最勇敢的执法者和赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019340_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw him kill three raiders single-handedly - with a fucking fork! I wouldn't believe that shit if I hadn't watched him do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾亲眼见到，他只用单手加一个叉子就干掉了3个土匪！天，如果不是我亲眼见到，打死我也不相信这种事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019340_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know much about him, except I think he came from Virginia or Maryland somewhere. He was some kind of high-ranking Regulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我对他的了解不是特别多，除了我知道他大概是从弗吉尼亚或马里兰什么地方来的。另外他的警衔似乎挺高。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019340_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, he saved my life several times, and he taught me everything I know. We parted ways years ago - he had unfinished business back East.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，他救了我好几次，教了我很多东西。几年前，我们分开了，他因为还有别的未完成的任务返回东部去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019340_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that, I came out west, looking to join up with the first crew that would hire me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那之后，我来到了西部，希望赶紧找到我的第一份工作，只要有人愿意雇我就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019340_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, that's enough of fucking storytime with Uncle Steven - are you ready to work or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，兰道尔叔叔的故事先到此结束，你准备好开始工作了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019340_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the most dangerous bounty you ever pursued?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经参与过的最危险的任务是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The most dangerous? Hmmm... I'd have to think about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最危险的……恩……让我想想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's tons of men that were plenty mean, and more than a few were just crazy. But dangerous? I'd have to go with Doc Friday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经历过须要面对很多人的任务，经历过很多很疯狂的任务，但危险的么？我想谈谈关于“星期五”医生的那一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ol' Doc isn't your typical Doctor - I hear he was an orthodontist before the war, whatever the fuck that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个医生不是你印象中典型的医生——我听说他在战前是一名正式牙医。操，管他是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doc's a ghoul gunslinger, and I'm speaking about him in the present tense because he's almost certainly still alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个食尸鬼枪手。我用一般现在时语气跟你描述他，是因为我觉得他现在应该还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Years ago a bounty came up on Doc because he had shot an actor in the testicles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前，出现一个悬赏，针对的目标就是他，原因是他开枪打爆了一个男演员的要害部位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never liked actors, so I decided to give Doc a chance and explain his side of the story. He was quite affable, despite being a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来就不喜欢演员，于是我给了他一个机会解释自己的行为。虽然他是一个食尸鬼，但他性格却十分和蔼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So many of them are self-pitying pissants, but Doc never whined - he just treated everyone with courtesy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们这一类大部分牢骚满天，让人感到厌恶，但这个医生从不发牢骚，而且礼貌地对待身边的每一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We talked it over, and he was so damned likable I agreed to settle his bounty on a game of cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈了很长时间，他的个性是如此的令人喜欢。最后我同意以一场扑克牌来决定夺赏那次金行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure enough, that slick bastard took me for everything, so I let him go. I'm glad I did, because later I heard about his reputation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果不言而喻，我输个精光，所以我让他走了。我很高兴我这么做了，因为之后他的名声越来越响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite his polite nature, ol' Doc is the fastest goddamn pistol in region, maybe in the whole fucking continent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了他礼貌的品行，他还是当地反应最快的枪手，哦，或者说整个大陆也说不定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear he once smoked an entire squad of legionaries that tried to arrest him for drug smuggling. He wiped them out in seconds, supposedly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他一个人干翻了整整一队想要逮捕他走私毒品的军团士兵。他或许在几秒之内就把他们全部干掉了，我猜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He still drifts from here to there, always with that ghoul whore at his side. "No-face Kate" was her name, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他常常徘徊在不同的地区，但他的身边总是跟着一个食尸鬼妓女。“没脸的凯特”，这大概是她的名字吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever encounter him, I'd advise you to return his courtesy. Shit, I got distracted again! Are gonna work or not, dammit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能碰到他，我建议你对它礼貌相待。操，我又被你分心了！准不准备开始干活？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019342_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Earlier you described ghouls as "Zombies". You know that's offensive, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前你曾经管食尸鬼叫“僵尸”。你知道这么做是一种冒犯，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not offensive - someone putting a 12 gauge up your ass and pulling the trigger, now that's offensive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那才不是冒犯——如果有人拿着左轮把枪口塞进你的菊花然后扣动扳机，这才是冒犯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once saw a zombie do that to one of my friends, so it left a strong impression.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经见一个僵尸对我的一个朋友那么做，所以这个情景给我留下了很深的印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, I've met some square ghouls like Doc Friday and, well... let me think... I'm sure there are others. I'll get back to that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我也见过一些正直的食尸鬼，如“星期五”医生，和……我想想……我肯定还见过别的。让我把话题再收回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, the incident I'm referencing happened over 10 years ago. Me and my partner, James, were tracking a bounty in New Mexico.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，刚才我提到的那回事发生在10年前。我和我一个同伙，詹姆斯，在新墨西哥州追踪一个赏金目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were unfamiliar with the territory, and eventually some ghouls got the jump on us. I was wounded, and James was green, so it went bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们对那个地区不是很熟悉，最终一些食尸鬼把我们包围了。我受了伤，詹姆斯也挂了彩，情况越来越往不好的方向发展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were a collection of ghoul fanatics from some "reservation", and they took us captive after the firefight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那群食尸鬼好像来自某种“预留地”。在交火停下来后，他们把我和詹姆斯抓了起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their leader was a ghoul named Phillips. Ray Phillips, that's it. I think he had relatives back east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的领袖是个叫菲利普斯的食尸鬼。雷.菲利普斯，就是这个名字。我猜他大概在东部有亲戚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, ol' Ray took special pride in making us "smoothskins" suffer. He said he would use the "five pains" method on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，雷对折磨我们这些滑皮非常高兴。他说，他要用“五种痛苦”来折磨我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He started with James, cutting off his nose, his hand, and then a foot. Ray was going to cut him in half, but James called him a, "Zombie cunt".
ESP.TRADUIT: 他先从詹姆斯开始，切了他的鼻子，他的手，然后是他的脚。雷接着想把他切为两半，但这是詹姆斯突然大喊“逼脸僵尸！！”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ray didn't appreciate the label, so he responded by shoving his shotgun into James and pulling the trigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷的脸扭曲成了一团，于是他把一把散弹枪从下面塞入了詹姆斯的体内，然后扣动了扳机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now how I got away is an interesting story, since... goddamnit, look at the time! I've got to finish this typing, and you've gotten me distracted!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我是怎么逃出来的是这段故事里最有趣的部分，因为……操，快看看现在几点了！我还要赶快完成这部分打印任务，而你他妈又让我分心了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready to work or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备开始新任务了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Ran_00019344_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Perform an unarmed attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: <开始徒手搏击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you... Dammit, you broke my arm!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈……可恶，你弄疼了我的胳膊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019BE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTheJudgeRef.damageav health 100 aaTheJudgeRef.damageav rightattackcondition 99

<Break the Judge's Arm>
ESP.TRADUIT: <扳折审判官的胳膊>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你……混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019EC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko... will... find... [incomprehensible gurgling].
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科...会...找到...[听不清的咯咯声]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties
Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019EC7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTheJudgeRef.kill
<Break the Judge's Neck>
ESP.TRADUIT: [折断审判官的脖子]

ESP.ORIGINAL: <He deftly dodges your punch> What the hell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的？！[他灵巧地躲开了你的攻击]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019EC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You perfidious worm! I'll eat your liver!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只恶心的蛆！我要吃了你的心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_00019EC9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaJudgeGuard1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard2Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard3Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuard4Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.startcombat player aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.startcombat player aatheJudgeRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.ModDisposition Player -100 aaTheJudgeRef.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard2Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard3Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuard4Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.setav aggression 2 aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.setav aggression 2 set aaBounties01.JudgeGreeted to 10
<Sucker punch the Judge>
ESP.TRADUIT: [向审判官全力一击]

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not impressed. Do you really need armed slaves to face a simple courier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不感兴趣。你真的需要那些奴隶来帮你对付我这么一个小邮递员吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've been useful... for a time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们……有时还是会有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_0001CF7C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, I make a habit of recycling my property every 6 months, and I'm already tired of this crew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我有一个习惯，每隔6个月就循环一次我的资产，现在这帮家伙我正好已经腻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_0001CF7C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's time for a new set of toys. But first, I'm going to relish killing you by myself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，是时候换换新玩具了。但首先，我要尝尝亲自杀死你的滋味！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_0001CF7C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJudgeGuard2Ref.kill aaJudgeGuard3Ref.kill aaJudgeGuard4Ref.kill aaJudgeGuardSlave1Ref.kill aaJudgeGuardSlave2Ref.kill
startcombat player aaTheJudgeRef.setav aggression 2 aatheJudgeRef.ModDisposition Player -100 aaJudgeGuard1Ref.kill
You, a simple courier? Ha! I've seen what you can do. I want your decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你？普通的小邮递员？哈！我知道你能做些什么。我想你赶快做决定
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBounties.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties01Jud_0001CF7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Taunt] I thought this would be a challenge. All I see is a fat guy and his slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: [嘲弄] 我把这当成一个挑战。我所能看到的，只有一个胖子，和他愚蠢的奴隶。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0200FADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've distinguished yourself as the premiere bounty hunter in the region, and as a result you've acquired a boost to your damage resistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经成为这个地区最顶尖的赏金猎人。你身经百战的经历令你对伤害更加无所畏惧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Judge's Crippled Arm
ESP.TRADUIT: 审判官残废的胳膊

ESP.ORIGINAL: DO NOT USE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别！用！这招！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Judge is now dead, which spells the end for Richter and Associates' presence in the Mojave Wasteland. You've distinguished yourself as the premiere bounty hunter in the region, and as a result you've acquired a boost to your damage resistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 审判官已经死了，这宣布了里克特合伙会在莫哈维这片土地上的终结。你已经成为这个地区最顶尖的赏金猎人。你身经百战的经历令你对伤害更加无所畏惧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Judge is Dead
ESP.TRADUIT: 审判官已死

ESP.ORIGINAL: You scan the crudely drawn map and notice a location to the west marked as "Shelter".
ESP.TRADUIT: 你浏览着这张粗糙的地图，注意到在西部的某一地点处标注着“藏身处”几个字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Map
ESP.TRADUIT: 地图

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've discovered a bunker filled with food and numerous amenities, a strange departure from the hostility of the wastes. You catch a scent of brahmin steak, apparently fresh off the grill. As your appetite surges, you hear the distinctive crackle of an intercom down the steps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了一个奇怪的地堡，里面不仅有大量优雅的装饰，还储备有大量食物。这里有一种远离莫哈维废土的奇妙感觉。你闻到了一股烤新鲜牛排的香味。正当你要开始流口水的时候，你听到了几步之外的对讲机发出了独有的劈啪声。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strange Bunker
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的地堡

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This letter is intended for &PCName;. If you're reading this, then I'm probably dead or kidnapped. I haven't been forthright about recent developments in the business, because I never wanted to get you mixed up in my bullshit, kid.
Nonetheless, here we are. You're probably wondering who the fuck would kill me, and to be honest, I can only speculate. However, I'll offer the prognostication for my untimely demise: recently, Randall & Associates has been cutting into the market share of Richter & Associates, a bounty hunting firm with a penchant for brutality. It is headed by a shadowy figure known simply as "The Judge". I don't know much about the man, but I'm willing to bet he's the person who's had me knocked off. I assume you've dealt with his assassin, the humorless Mr. Sugar. I've blown off the initial advances by the Judge's cronies, so it's only a matter of time before he uses force. I'm probably just being paranoid.
Anyway, if you are reading this, I want you to know you're the best goddamn bounty hunter I ever had the pleasure of working with, although I'll never tell you as long as I'm alive. I want you to take all the caps, but there's something else. There's a .44 revolver in the safe that I call "Sweet Revenge". It was manufactured a long time ago, well before the war. I swore I would never fire it until I found Marko, the man who butchered my family back east. You're all I've got left, kid, so take it. Better yet, take it and go kill the assholes who put me in the ground!
Cormac, the Judge's chief slave trader, is a liason to the Vipers. If you find Cormac, you'll find the way to the Judge.
There's one last thing: swear to me, here and now, that no matter what happens, you'll find Marko and kill him for me, and everyone else he's taken from. I know the Judge is going to be in your crosshairs, but that was strictly business, and I came to accept such risks long ago. Know this: when Marko dies a violent, painful death, my soul will be at rest. Until that day, I'll do my best to haunt your ass!
It was a privilege to work with you, kid. Remember: Justice is truth in action. Let that guide you in the coming days.
Sincerely, Steven Randall
P.S. If you ever come across a Marshall named Cooper, give him my regards.
ESP.TRADUIT:
给我亲爱的 &PCName;。如果你正在读这封信，那么我可能已经死了。我对最近我们生意上的进展并不向你坦率，是因为我不想把你带进这个火坑，我的孩子。
尽管如此，我们还是走到这一步了。你可能在想，是谁他妈的杀了我。实话实说，我自己也只能推测。但是，我的突然死亡是有征兆的：最近，我们兰道尔同伙会的市场份额正在被另一个赏金猎人公司，野蛮粗鲁的里克特同伙会，抢夺。这家公司隐藏在幕后的头头据说是一个叫“审判官”的家伙。我对这个家伙不太了解，但我打赌，我要是死了的话也一定会死在他的手上。我猜你已经见过他的一个刺客了--糖先生。 我在生意上的某些方面已经失了先机，审判官何时动用武力也只是个时间上的问题。 我可能有些偏执狂了。
总之，如果你正在读这封信，我想告诉你，你是与我合作过的他妈的最好的赏金猎人，尽管在我活着的时候我不会跟你说这些话。我把我的钱都留给你了。当然，我还要提一样东西，在我的保险箱里有一把.44左轮手枪，我称它为“甜蜜的复仇”。这把枪是在很久以前生产的。这么多年来我一直舍不得用它，因为这是为日后向杀死我家人的那个叫马可的屠夫复仇留着的。现在你就是我的全部，孩子，这把枪你拿走吧。最好能用它宰掉干掉我的家伙！
科马克，审判官的奴隶贸易主管，暗地里也负责组织联络任务。找到他，你就能找到审判官。
最后还有一件事：向我发誓，就在这，现在，不论发生什么，你都要帮我找到马尔科，帮我复仇，帮所有受他所害的人复仇。我知道，审判官一定会死于你的枪口，但这只是生意，我很久以来就知道自己要为此承担风险。记住：只有让马尔科下地狱，我的灵魂才能安息。否则，不到他死的那一天，我的灵魂不会停止骚扰你！
能与你一起共事过，这是我的荣幸，孩子。记住：公正不是光靠嘴皮子就能实现的。望这句话日后能被你铭记在心。
真心祝愿， 斯蒂夫·兰道尔
P.S. 如果你能碰到一个叫库珀·马歇尔的人，请向他表示一下我的问候。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔的遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You scan the blood-stained pages of Quantrill's diary. It's a crude account of countless raids, scavenging missions, and skirmishes that span several decades.
The final log mentions his superior, officer, Onoda, and Quantrill's feelings for him. He mentions their intent to assault the Brotherhood of Steel Safehouse, as a means to acquire weaponry.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你浏览着沾着血的夸斯利日记。上面粗糙地记载这几十年来他所参与的各种抢劫、谋杀与争斗。
最后几行内容提到了他的上级长官，奥诺达，以及夸斯利对他的长官的观点和看法。他还提到，他们接下来准备入侵钢铁兄弟会的避难所，为的是那些高科技武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quantrill's Diary
ESP.TRADUIT: 夸斯利的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL: As several factions vie for control of New Vegas, the demand for independent contractors has soared. Numerous firms have emerged that specialize in the profitable, albeit risky enterprise of bounty hunting. Word has reached you that one nascent company, Randall & Associates, is screening applicants for employment. To begin the application process, collect the recruitment module at the saloon in Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于新维加斯地区由数个集团掌控，对由独立的第三方来执行某些特殊任务的需求开始逐渐增长。大量的专注于这种高风险但高回报的赏金公司开始出现。你听到一个小道消息，说现在有一个新开的小公司--“兰道尔同伙会”正在招人。你可以在清泉镇的沙龙里找到招聘模块，从而开始你的赏金之旅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: New Vegas Bounties
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯赏金行动

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've discovered the half-eaten remains of Tomas. It's a grisly scene that turns your stomach; you fear that the other two children have met a similiar fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到了托马斯被吃得只剩了一半儿的尸体。眼前的场景令你恶心得想吐。你不由得开始担心剩下两个孩子的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tomas' Remains
ESP.TRADUIT: 托马斯的残骸

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite the din of the intercom, you're able to make out a peculiar noise overhead. As you look up, you become light-headed, and feel overwhelmed with a warm, relaxing sensation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了对讲机的聒噪，你的头上也发出了独特的声响。你缓缓抬头向上看，这时你的头开始变轻，浑身好像被一种温暖的、放松的感觉索压倒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peculiar Noise
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的声音

ESP.ORIGINAL: It appears Jack is waiting for you. You should approach with caution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来杰克在等你。接下来你须要小心谨慎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jack
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wake up in a daze, stripped of your belongings, and soon struggle to your feet. You notice a strange man eyeing you beyond the bars. You suspect he is your captor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你昏昏沉沉地醒来了，发现自己的东西都被扒掉了。你挣扎着站起来，看到门闩后面有一双注视你的双眼。你猜他可能就是你要抓的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waking Up
ESP.TRADUIT: 苏醒

ESP.ORIGINAL: The blood-stained note reads, "&PCName;, Randall & Associates is finished. Your employer is dead. Javier will be with you shortly. Sincerely, the Judge".
ESP.TRADUIT: 这张渗血的笔记上写着：“&PCName;，兰道尔同伙会完蛋了。你的老板死了。哈维尔很快就会和你在一起。真诚的，审判官。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bloody Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 渗血的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've discovered Ben's remains. He appears to have been skinned, quartered, and butchered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了本的残骸。他的躯体四分五裂，看起来惨不忍睹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ben's Fate
ESP.TRADUIT: 本的命运

ESP.ORIGINAL: You find the shack empty and devoid of clues. You should continue your search for Chuck elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现这个小屋空空如也，而且毫无线索痕迹。或许你该到别的地方继续寻找恰克的踪迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Empty Shack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 空无一人的屋子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After a polite handshake, Judge Richter explains that you should make contact with his chief of contract killing, Bobby Bass. He also mentions that the signing bonus is actually part of an incentive program that will require decades of service, so you shouldn't expect any grand sums until you've proven yourself to the organization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一个有礼貌的握手后，李希特法官解释说，你应该从首席杀手，鲍比贝斯那里接受委托。他还提到，一开始奖金实际上是一个激励计划的一部分，需要几十年的服务，所以你不应该期望任何盛大的款项，直到你已经证明自己的组织忠心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome aboard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎入伙！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're surprised to see Randall is missing. Across the room, you see a note pinned against the wall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你震惊地发现兰道尔失踪了。穿过屋子，你发现在墙上钉了一张纸条。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Missing
ESP.TRADUIT: 失踪
